Please try again in a few minutes.

to stand up without intersecting the Portal.

please try again in a few minutes.

ERRORCODE_STEAM_TICKET: Failed to get Steam session ticket, check connection to Steam.

GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BEACONED_BLOCKS_MINED_2_: Blocks mined from inside a Beacon

GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BEACON_STATUS_2_TITLE: To Be, Or Not To Be
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BOUGHT_BELOW_OR_EQUAL_AV: Items bought from a Shop Stand below the average world price that still incurred Tax
Items bought from a Shop Stand below the average world price that still incurred Tax
Items bought from a Shop Stand below the average world price that still incurred Tax
Items bought from a Shop Stand below the average world price that still incurred Tax
Items bought from a Shop Stand below the average world price that still incurred Tax
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_ADVANCED_FUEL_BE: Acquire an Improved Beacon Fuel or better
Fuel a Beacon with more durable Fuel
Be more than Minor! Try using Improved Beacon Fuel or better in a Beacon Control to Fuel it for longer.
A Bit of Better Beacon Fuel
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_MEMBER_DE: Add a Friend to your Friends list
Use the Beacon Control to assign a Beacon Permission to a Friend
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_MEMBER_SU: Care to share? Sharing Beacon access with Friends allows them to interact with and change anything inside your Beacon. Ask Friends to help Build your Base, allow access to Machines or provide Storage and help to reduce the need to Warp. Interact with your Beacon Control and select the Permissions Tab to add a Friend from you Friends list. Individual roles can be assigned to each Beacon Member to limit certain privileges.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_PERMISSIO: Place a Beacon Control in a Plot
Assign Permissions to a Beacon Member

You can assign Permissions to individual Plots in your Beacons in which Members can perform certain actions. Simply place a Beacon Control in the Plot you wish to edit, then set the Permissions in that Beacon Control. The Beacon Control can be removed whilst still preserving your Permission choices.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_WORLD_ELE: Acquire any level of Beacon Fuel
Travel to any type of Elemental World
Place a Beacon Control on an Elemental World
Fuel a Beacon Control on an Elemental World

As you travel the Known Worlds you'll come to realise that not all Worlds are equal. Certain Worlds have Elemental properties which in some cases can prove harmful. Creatures native to an Elemental World often take on the characteristics of that World and may cause temporary negative effects on Citizens who they attack. You'll need to be careful as you move on to colonise these types of Worlds, but colonise them we must.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_WORLD_EXT: Acquire any type of Beacon fuel
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Place a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Fuel a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Ready to colonise in a more extreme environment? You'll find more aggressive Creatures and rarer Resources whilst you continue to colonise The Known Worlds. Build, increase your Beacon Prestige and survive.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_WORLD_HAR: Acquire any level of Beacon fuel
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Place a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Fuel a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

By now you may have realised that some Worlds are harder than others to Explore, Mine, Build on or even Hunt. Less hospitable Worlds may be rich in rarer Resources, but they're also filled with more aggressive Creatures who aren't always happy that you're moving into their World. Colonise and increase your Beacon's Prestige here, but be wary of your surroundings.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_WORLD_MED: Acquire any level of Beacon Fuel
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Place a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Fuel a Beacon Control on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

You've made your mark on an unassuming World, now make your mark in less hospitable places. It's just the same as building Bases in a more hospitable location, but with somewhat less placid Creatures and the odd Resource you may not have seen before.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_BEACON_WORLD_SPE: Acquire any type of Beacon Fuel
Place a Beacon Control on a Special World
Fuel a Beacon Control on a Special World

Some Worlds are deemed Special due to their richness in ultra-rare Resources such as Blink, Rift or Darkmatter. These are notoriously tricky Worlds to inhabit, packed with tough Creatures who really don't want Citizens moving in on their patch. You'll need to have your wits about you and some extremely tough Tools and Weapons to hand to get the most out of Special Worlds. And remember, build a Beacon when you get there, the Resources here are ones you'll definitely want to come back for again and again.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_CHISEL_ADVANCED_: Use the Copper Chisel to shape Blocks:
Use the Iron Chisel to shape Blocks:

Take heed, not all Chisels are made equal! Different Chisels create different results, and not all can be used on all Blocks. Experiment with various Chisels to add character to your Beacon bases and structures.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_CHISEL_BASIC_DES: Use the Stone Chisel to shape Blocks:
Use a Chisel to rotate Machines or Props:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_CHISEL_BASIC_SUM: Unleash your structural creativity with a Chisel. When equipped, aim the Chisel at any corner of a Block, then use it to sculpt a new shape. Chisels can be crafted within a Workbench or purchased from another Citizen.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_DOORS_SUMMARY: It's not a real home until you've got a Door. You can use several Door Pieces placed down in formation to build bigger Doors.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_FOOTFALL_DESCRIP: Collect Coin from your Beacon Control
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_FOOTFALL_SUMMARY: A Coin donation is made to your Beacon Control each time a unique Citizen, who is not a Beacon Member, visits your Beacon. Try to make your Beacon stand out and become a useful hub or attraction for other Citizens to visit and increase your Beacon Footfall.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_GARDENING_SUMMAR: Peace, tranquility and a spot of gardening! Grab a Shovel and dig up some Grass and Flowers to add a relaxing touch to your Builds. To plant Grass Seed or Flowers simply Equip them in your hand and use the Item to place the them. To get longer Grass simply place more Grass Seed on top of Grass.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_LOCKS_DESCRIPTIO: Place a Lock next to a Storage Block to secure it
Place a Lock next to a Door to secure it
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_LOCKS_SUMMARY: Need to keep hold of your stash? Craft a Lock and restrict access to Doors, Storage and other interactive Blocks in your Beacon. Locks can be purchased from other Citizens or Crafted in a Workbench, once you have mastered the Decoration Crafting Skill.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_MASTER_BEACON_DE: Extend your Beacon using a Beacon Plotter
Place a Beacon Control inside a Beacon
Set the Beacon Control as the Master Beacon Control
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_MASTER_BEACON_SU: As you extend and improve your Beacon you may want to change where the centre of the Beacon is located. This can be done by placing a new Beacon Control at the desired location within your existing Beacon. Interact with the new Control and select 'set as Master Beacon Control'. Once set, the location of your Beacon will be updated on the Compass and this will be where you Warp to when setting the Beacon as your Warp Destination. Remember to keep your Beacon Controls Fuelled to keep them active!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_MAYOR_SETTLEMENT: Increase your Prestige to reach Settlement status
Decorate your Plots with Blocks or Items:
Refine your Build with Chiselled Blocks:

You don't need to run for office to become Mayor of a Settlement. Build your Beacon Prestige by adding Plots, Blocks, Items and re-shaping with a Chisel. Raise your Prestige high enough to turn the Beacon into a Settlement. The owner of the Beacon with the highest Prestige in a Settlement becomes Mayor.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_ELE: Open a Portal on an Elemental World

One Portal is never enough! It's useful to have a few Portals set to different types of World. You never know where you might find an excellent Location for Resources, the perfect Settlement for Trade, a great place for Hunting unusual Creatures or when you might want to dash quickly away from a dangerous World (and back again).
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_EXT: Open a Portal on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Portals are a must for getting to and from particularly dangerous Worlds. The more dangerous the Worlds, the greater its supply of rare Resources and harder to Defeat Creatures, so you may want to get out of there fast!
The Good, The Bad and The Portal
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_HAR: Open a Portal on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

As you Portal here and there, remember to find less hospitable Worlds, to set up for a return Journey. These types of World may seem harder to inhabit than some others, but if you're brave enough to travel there, you'll be rewarded with rarer Resources and tougher Creature combat situations.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_HOM: Acquire Oort Shards to Fuel the Portal:
Build a Portal to match the destination Portal Conduits:
Add the Portal Token to the Portal's Destination
Add Oort Shards and open the Portal

Imagine being able to Travel from one World to another in the blink of an eye. You can with Portals! They take a little time to build and set up, but it's well worth it for the ability to travel instantly backwards and forwards between two separate Worlds. You'll need both Portal Conduits and Oort Shards in your Inventory to get started.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_MED: Open a Portal on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Portals offer the perfect way to travel The Known Worlds both for you and other Citizens. Of course, you don't have to own a Portal to travel through it, but if you Build it yourself you'll be able to place it exactly where you want it. Try opening a Portal to a less hospitable World and have easy access to its Resources, Creatures, Settlements and other Citizens.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_PORTAL_WORLD_SPE: Open a Portal on a Blink, Rift or Darkmatter World

If you find yourself visiting a Special World, you may want to Build a Portal for a return journey. Special Worlds house some very special raw Resources like Blink, Rift and Darkmatter, available very rarely elsewhere, but they're also particularly hard Worlds to explore safely.
Have I Told You Lately That I Portalled?
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_SETTLEMENT_JOIN_: Acquire a Beacon Fuel of any strength
Discover and enter a nearby Settlement
Place the Beacon Control next to the Settlement
Add Fuel to your Beacon Control to join the Settlement
Add Plots to connect your Beacon to the Settlement
Decorate your Plot with Blocks or Items

Get connected with Settlements. Settlements form when a Beacon or group of Beacons gain a certain amount of Prestige. Not all Beacons need to belong to the same Citizen to establish a Settlement, and you can join a Settlement at any time by connecting Plots from one of your nearby Beacons. Builder View shows you where yours and other Citizens Plots are to help you Build a connection.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_STORAGE_BLOCKS_D: Place Storage Blocks in a Beaconed area:
Add an Item to a Storage Block
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_STORAGE_BLOCKS_S: Inventory overflowing? Don't leave those Resources behind! Adding Storage to your Builds lightens your load and allows Resource sharing with Friends. Combine multiple Shelves or Storage Blocks to effectively increase Storage capacity. Storage Blocks can be Crafted or purchased from other Citizens.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_VICEROY_DESCRIPT: Raise a Settlement's Prestige until it becomes Capital City
Become the Viceroy of a World by owning the Capital City
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDER_VICEROY_SUMMARY: Viceroy, or as some would call it Ruler of The World is the highest honour a Citizen can achieve. You can become Viceroy by building or owning the largest, most prestigious Settlement on the World, aka The Capital City. Not only will you gain the title of Viceroy, but you'll also be able to name that Capital City, leaving your mark on the World. You can check Settlement Rankings in the Places tab.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CAPITALS_DISCOVERED_3_TI: The Heart Of The World III
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CAPITALS_DISCOVERED_4_TI: The Heart Of The World IV
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CAPITALS_DISCOVERED_5_TI: The Heart Of The World V
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CAUSTIC_ATMOSPHERE_DESCR: Regions discovered on Worlds with a Caustic Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_1_DESCRIPTION: Total Coin spent on Items which incurred a tax fee
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_1_TITLE: Every Coin Earned Is A Coin Spent
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_2_DESCRIPTION: Total Coin spent on Items which incurred a tax fee
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_3_DESCRIPTION: Total Coin spent on Items which incurred a tax fee
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_4_DESCRIPTION: Total Coin spent on Items which incurred a tax fee
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_5_DESCRIPTION: Total Coin spent on Items which incurred a tax fee
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_EACH_DAY_1_DE: Spend Coin on Items each day from Shop Stands
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_EACH_DAY_2_DE: Spend Coin on Items each day from Shop Stands
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_EACH_DAY_3_DE: Spend Coin on Items each day from Shop Stands
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_EACH_DAY_4_DE: Spend Coin on Items each day from Shop Stands
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COIN_SPENT_EACH_DAY_5_DE: Spend Coin on Items each day from Shop Stands
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_AUGMENT_KILLS_DES: Combine the Weapon Augment with the Weapon
Defeat Creatures with an Augmented Weapon:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_AUGMENT_KILLS_SUM: Get the most out of your Weapons with Augments, a handy Item that temporarily modifies and enhance a Weapons ability when combined.  Augments can be added to a Weapon by combining them in the Inventory. Different Weapon Augments have different properties and will result in different effects. You can remove an Augment from a Weapon by ejecting it in the Inventory.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_EASY_ELEMENTAL_KI: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Elemental-type Wildstock on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Spitters on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Cuttletrunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Hoppers on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Roadrunners on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Elemental Shards on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Elemental Worlds are filled with Elemental Creatures. On the face of it, they're just like the Creatures you'd meet on non-elemental Worlds, but more attuned to the Gem radiation found on their World. Elemental Creatures exhibit specific properties which mean they deal Elemental Damage and Debuffs to Citizens who encounter them. These Creatures may be more aggressive and more damaging to Citizens, but they are known to hold special Elemental Shards which can be used in advanced Crafting Recipes
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_FOCUS_KILLS_SUMMA: Focus Skills unlock the ability to build Focus each time you deal Damage to Creatures, up to a maximum of 10 Stacks; a very useful ability for keen Combat-oriented Citizens to have! Once you have accumulated enough Focus you can consume a Focus Brew and unleash the effects of your Focus Skills in one Attack. The effects will depend on the Skills you've unlocked and the amount of Focus you have accumulated at the time.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_FORGED_KILLS_DESC: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Creatures with a Forged Weapon on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_FORGED_KILLS_SUMM: With the right level of Skill and luck, it is possible to Forge Gear of untold might or quirkiness in the Centraforge. The kind of Gear that would help to more easily conquer challenging Creatures. Go forth and Forge. Maybe the Centraforge will fall in your favour.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_FORGED_KILLS_TITL: By The Power Of the Centraforge
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_HARD_ELEMENTAL_KI: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Elemental-type Wildstock on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Spitters on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Cuttletrunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Hoppers on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Roadrunners on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Elemental Shards on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Take a trip to the least hospitable Elemental Worlds of all and take the challenge of Defeating some extremely tough Creatures. Remember, attacks from Elemental Creatures can cause a Citizen Blast, Burn, Chill, Corrosive, Shock or Toxic-type Debuffs. However, Combat with these types of Creatures is necessary to obtain Elemental Shards, unless you buy them in a Shop Stand.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_HEAL_DESCRIPTION_: Acquire Bombs which have been Forged with Healing properties.
Use Healing Bombs on other Citizens to restore their Health:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_HEAL_SUMMARY: Who'd of thought it, Bombs that help not harm? There's no better way to Heal nearby Citizens than the explosive Healing power of certain Forged Bombs. Equip a Bomb Forged with a Healing-type Boon and throw it close to a nearby Citizen to Heal them. Bombs can also be Forged with Boons that remove Debuffs, replenish Energy and apply other Buffs. Most Bombs of course are used for dealing Damage to nearby Creatures.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_HOSTILE_CREATURES: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Cuttletrunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Hoppers on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Creature Drops on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:

Predator or prey? Many unique and unusual Creatures roam the Known Worlds, some more dangerous than others. Whether you choose to hunt Creatures for Resources, or fight only when attacked, you will need Weapons. Weapons are highly effective at dealing Damage to Creatures. Once defeated, deal one final blow to the Creature to release its Drops.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_MEDIUM_ELEMENTAL_: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Elemental-type Wildstock on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Spitters on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Cuttletrunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Hoppers on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Defeat Elemental-type Roadrunners on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Elemental Shards on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

By now you'll know that some Worlds are less hospitable than others, much like the Creatures that inhabit them. You've faced Elemental Creatures on hospitable Elemental Worlds, now try to take the challenge on a tougher World. Remember, Elemental Creatures can exhibit the characteristics of the World-type they are on, be that Blast, Burn, Chill, Corrosive, Shock or Toxic in nature. If you're attacked by an Elemental Creature you'll invariably suffer Debuffs based on that Creatures Elemental-type. However, Combat with these types of Creatures is necessary for obtaining Elemental Shards, unless you can find them in a Shop Stand.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_METEORITE_ELEMENT: Defeat Creatures on an Elemental World:
Complete an Active Meteorites on an Elemental World

Citizens throughout the Known Worlds are reporting an increase in Meteorite attacks on Elemental-type Worlds. They'll need your help to defend against a new influx of Creatures and to protect their Colonies. Travel to an Elemental World and help to Defeat a Meteorite.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_METEORITE_SPECIAL: Travel to a Blink, Rift or Darkmatter Special World
Defeat Creatures on a Special World:
Complete an Active Meteorites on a Special World

A number of Citizens have reported increased sightings of Meteorite strikes on Blink, Rift and Darkmatter Special Worlds. Travel to one of these Worlds and help defend its Citizens against increased Meteorite activity.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_RAGE_KILLS_SUMMAR: Rage Skills unlock the ability to build Rage when receiving Damage from Creatures, up to a maximum of 10 Stacks; a particularly useful Ability for defence-oriented Citizens. Once you have accumulated enough Rage, you can consume a Rage Brew and unleash your Rage Skills in one attack. The effects will depend on the Skills you've unlocked and the amount of Rage you have accumulated at the time.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_REPLENISH_DESCRIP: Acquire a Bag of Bombs Forged with Replenishing properties
Use Replenishing Bombs to replenish another Citizen's Energy:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_REPLENISH_SUMMARY: Always using Bombs for dealing Damage? Remember Bombs can be Forged with Boons with restorative properties, handy when you're in Combat with other Citizens who are low on Energy, Health or having Debuff side effects. Grab a Replenishing Bomb and go replenish another Citizens Energy.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_REVIVE_DESCRIPTIO: Add the Revive Augment to the Totem
Use the Augmented Totem to Revive a Defeated Citizen
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_REVIVE_SUMMARY: Offer a much needed boost to Defeated Citizens by unlocking your Revive Skill. Once unlocked you can use Revive Augments with your Totem to Revive Defeated Citizens. You'll help them to recover a portion of their Health and Energy, as well as reducing their Defeat Penalty. Continue to upgrade your Revive Skill to reduce the cooldown between uses and improve the effect of the Skill.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_ROADRUNNER_SUMMAR: The elusive Roadrunner is a quick and nimble Creature with a very nervous disposition, so a well laid trap is key to catching these frantic Creatures.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_ROADRUNNER_TITLE: Roadrunner be nimble, Roadrunner be Quick
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTI: Acquire a Bag of Bombs Forged with Cleansing properties.
Use Cleansing Bombs to remove another Citizen's Debuffs:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SUPPORT_SUMMARY: Bombs don't have to be harmful, with the right Ingredients and a little time in a Centraforge they can be quite restorative. Bombs Forged with Cleansing properties can be used to remove Debuffs applied to other Citizens.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_ELEMENTA: Hunt Creatures on an Elemental World:
Complete Active Meteorites on an Elemental World:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

With some Dangerous Survival under your belt, it's time to hone your Combat Skills even further with a spot of Creature hunting on an Elemental World. You'll need to survive a Meteorite Attack or two without being Defeated, to rise to this challenge. Remember, Attacks from Creatures on Elemental Worlds often come with temporary side effects.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_EXTREME_: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Hunt Creatures on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Complete Active Meteorites on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

You've survived the rest, but can you survive hunting Creatures on more extreme Worlds without being Defeated? Grab your toughest Gear, a few Brews and your wits to survive a Meteorite Attack or two in the harshest of Worlds.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_HARD_DES: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Hunt Creatures on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Complete Active Meteorites on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_HARD_SUM: You've survived Creature hunts and a Meteorite strike or two on hospitable World without being Defeated, now it's time to challenge your survival Skills on a less hospitable World and become an Extreme Survivor.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_MEDIUM_D: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Hunt Creatures on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Complete Active Meteorites on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_MEDIUM_S: You've tested your combat Skills against all types of Creatures, now it's time to hone those Skills even more and go hunt without being Defeated. It's best to start your challenge on a more hospitable World!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_SURVIVOR_SPECIAL_: Hunt Creatures on a Special World:
Complete Active Meteorites on a Special World:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

You've survived Creature hunts and Meteorite Attacks on an Elemental World without being Defeated. Can you do the same on a Blink, Rift or Darkmatter Special World? Grab some tough Weapons, Brews, get out there and survive!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_TIER_3_CREATURES_: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

The call to defend the Known World Colonies has begun! Citizens throughout the Universe need help to hunt and Defeat Strong Creatures. A test that is not for the weak! Remember, Creatures often drop Resources that cannot be found elsewhere.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_TIER_4_CREATURES_: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

A Mighty Creature is mighty indeed, but mighty Gear will Defeat them. Grab some tough Weapons and head out to hunt and Defeat Creatures in a less hospitable environment. Remember, Creatures often drop Resources that cannot be found elsewhere.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_COMBAT_TIER_5_CREATURES_: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Rumours are rife that extremely hard to Defeat Creatures have been spotted throughout more extreme Worlds. Citizens inhabiting these areas may be in need of your help to defeat them. Grab a sturdy Weapon and go find some Elite Creatures to Defeat. Remember, Creatures often drop Resources that cannot be found elsewhere.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_SOLD_II: Edible Items sold in a Shop Stand which incurred Tax
Edible Items sold in a Shop Stand which incurred Tax
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_SOLD_IV: Edible Items sold in a Shop Stand which incurred Tax
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_SOLD_I_: Edible Items sold in a Shop Stand which incurred Tax
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_SOLD_V_: Edible Items sold in a Shop Stand which incurred Tax
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_ATLAS_DESCRIPTION_T: Craft Copper Bars in a Furnace:
Craft an Atlas in the Workbench using Copper Bar and Glass
Equip and use the Atlas to synchronise it to the Current World
Find a new Region using the Atlas and Compass
In the Inventory add an Ore to the Atlas to scan for that Resource
Use the Atlas to locate and collect the Ore
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_ATLAS_SUMMARY: Get yourself on the map with an Atlas; Craft or purchase one from another Citizen to find your way around the World, discover the location of Resources or even find the perfect place for a Beacon. To use the Atlas, you'll need to Equip it then Use it to synchronises it to your Current World. Then, each time you discover a Region it will appear on the Atlas, helping you to get a better picture of the World you are on. Atlases are locked to the World you first use them on and you will need to acquire and synchronise new Atlases for each World you visit.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_BUILD_BASE_DESCRIPT: Place Storage Blocks in your Beacon:
Add Items to your Beacon to increase its Prestige:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_BUILD_BASE_SUMMARY: Move on from your basic Beacon foundations with a little exterior and interior design! No Beacon is complete without walls and a Door or two to keep Creatures (and unwanted guests) at bay, you'll also need a few torches to light up the place at night. Finally, a few Storage Blocks will go a long way when you want to make room in your Inventory but still keep your Items for later. Remember, the more useful your Beacon, the more likely you'll be to receive visitors and the more Prestige your Beacon has, the more likely it will be to become a Settlement. Build and build some more!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_BUILD_BASE_TITLE: If you Build it They Will Come
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_CAVE_MINING_DESCRIP: Open a Warp to your Beacon
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_CAVE_MINING_SUMMARY: Try a little mountaineering or caving whilst exploring The Known Worlds! Mining in both of these areas can uncover essential Resources rarely found elsewhere. You may even find pieces of Technology last used by the Oort who came before.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_HUNTING_DESCRIPTION: Consume cooked Food to restore Energy
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_HUNTING_SUMMARY: Resources aren't just from Mining! Defeated Creatures are also a good source of Resources, many that would otherwise only be obtained through Trade. Grab a Weapon and Defeat Creatures to pick up Items such as Meat, Bone, Organs and non-organic materials which the Creature may be carrying. All are vital for a Recipe or two.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_DESCRIPTI: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Discover a Meteorite on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Defeat Meteorite Creatures on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Complete Meteorite on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect Meteorite Core Drops on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Return to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_ELEMENTAL: Increase Volatile Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a Toxin or Corrosive Elemental World
Collect Corrosion Shards from Corrosive-type Creatures:
Collect Toxin Shards from Toxin-type Creatures:
Complete Active Meteorites on an Elemental World:
Collect Oortstone from Meteorites on an Elemental World:
Return to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Travel to a Burn or Blast Elemental World
Collect Blast Shards from Blast-type Creatures:
Collect Burn Shards from Burn-type Creatures:
Increase Potent Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a Chill or Shock Elemental World
Collect Chill Shards from Chill-type Creatures:
Collect Shock Shards from Shock-type Creatures:
Increase Caustic Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food

Rumours continue to circulate that there are Worlds out there that are both perilous and rich in Rare Resources, some with highly dangerous Elemental properties. You may need to visit Worlds like this to gain new materials that allow you Craft better Gear for conquering tougher Creatures or mining more robust Resources. Beware, the Atmosphere on Elemental Worlds may prove to be particularly dangerous and has a habit of fundamentally changing the Creatures which live upon them.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_SUMMARY: In the Known Worlds it's not unheard of for Meteorites packed with celestial energy to crash to the ground. As the Meteorite's energy peaks, Portals are ripped open in the sky bringing with them a hoard of Creatures. After a period, an Active Meteorite's energy dissipates leaving behind a Meteorite Core for you to collect, this process can be accelerated by Defeating the Portal Creatures.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_4_DE: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect Meteorite Core Drops on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Return to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Mine Silver or Gold Ores on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Acquire Silver or Gold Alloy Gear
Collect a Wildstock Horn Trophy on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect a Spitter Scale Trophy on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect a Cuttletrunk Tentacle Trophy on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect a Hopper Thermal Core Trophy on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect a Roadrunner Feather Trophy on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Complete Active Meteorites on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_4_SU: There are rumours circulating amongst other Citizens that more dangerous Worlds harbour more valuable materials which can be used to create more Advanced Items and powerful Gear. However with more valuable Items come many more dangers. Be on the lookout for aggressive, hard to Defeat Creatures, dangerous Atmospheres and a higher density of Meteorite hits.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_6_DE: Increase Volatile Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a Toxin or Corrosive-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Mine for Amethyst on a Toxin or Corrosive-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Mine Emerald on a Toxin or Corrosive-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Complete Meteorites on an Elemental-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Oortstone from Meteorites on an Elemental-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Return to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Travel to a Burn or Blast-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Mine for Diamonds on a Burn or Blast-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Mine for Rubies on a Burn or Blast-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Increase Potent Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a Shock or Chill-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Mine for Sapphire on a Shock or Chill-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Mine for Topaz on a Shock or Chill-type World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Increase Caustic Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_6_SU: It has been told that there are Worlds where Gem mining is a must. These Worlds are treacherous and often filled with damaging Atmospheres. You'll need to make sure your Citizen has adequate protection to avoid Atmospheric Defeat in these areas, and you'll need tough Gear both to survive Creature Attacks and to Mine those precious Gems. It will be worth it though when you realise they're Crafting potential!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_7_DE: Increase Volatile Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Acquire Blink, Rift or Darkmatter Gear
Complete Meteorites on a Special-type World:
Collect Oortstone from Meteorites on a Special-type World:
Return to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Increase Caustic Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Increase Potent Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_METEORITE_TIER_7_SU: The rumours continue to fly, telling of Special Worlds which hold the rarest of Resources; Rift, Darkmatter and Blink. Acquire these Resources, and you will be able to Craft the most Powerful Gear in the Known Worlds (along with some very fetching decorative Items). Your journey to find them, however, will not be easy, you may encounter aggressive Elemental Creatures and dangerous Atmospheres which requires specific protection to survive.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_WARP_DESCRIPTION_TA: Craft Vital Essence using an Extractor
Add the World to Tracked Worlds in the Places Menu
Craft a Warp Augment using a Compactor
Combine the Warp Augment with a Totem
Point the Totem at a World and Fire towards your chosen Destination
Open a Warp to the Landing Site
Travel through the Warp to the new World
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORE_WARP_SUMMARY: Looking to explore a new World? Ready for a little onward travel? You need Warp Augments, the Totem attachment that gets you to places you've never been before! With few not so basic Ingredients and a Totem, you will be able to select a Landing Site on another World. Remember, Warp Augments are jettisoned to pinpoint your chosen Landing Site, and you will need a new one each time you select a destination in this way.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORRUPTION_SPECIAL_2_DES: Ancient Corruption, Mould and Growth gathered
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORRUPTION_SPECIAL_3_DES: Ancient Corruption, Mould and Growth gathered
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORRUPTION_SPECIAL_4_DES: Ancient Corruption, Mould and Growth gathered
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CORRUPTION_SPECIAL_5_DES: Ancient Corruption, Mould and Growth gathered
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_COMPACTOR_UPGRAD: Place the Power Coil next to the Compactor
Craft a Recipe which requires Power in the Compactor

Compact more and more, by upgrading your Compactors with a Power Coil, the key to unlocking more advanced Compactor Recipes. Place a Compactor Power Coil next to the Compactor to provide it with Power. Add additional Power Coils to increase the amount of Power and speed up the Crafting process.
Acquire an Advanced Compactor Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Compactor
Complete Compactor Advanced Power Coil upgrade
Craft a Recipe which requires over 2,400 Power using the Compactor

Get even more from your Compactor with an Advanced Power Coil. Place an Advanced Power Coil next to the Compactor to provide it with a good dose of Power and unlock the ability to craft more advanced Recipes. More Advanced Power Coils generate more Power.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_COMPACTOR: Connect the Compactor to a Spark Generator
Craft an Item in a Compactor

Make your Blocks and Objects tougher than average with a Compactor. By using a powerful compacting process you can create stronger, harder to break Blocks and Objects as well as unlocking amazing new Items to Craft. The Compactor is the perfect Machine for discovering new capabilities in the Resources you find.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_EXTRACTOR: Connect the Extractor to a Spark Generator
Craft an Item in an Extractor

There's more to some Blocks than meets the eye! Certain Materials contain valuable Resources deep inside them which can only be acquired through a complex extraction process. Acquiring an Extractor will help you to uncover the mysteries of these hidden Resources.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_FURNACE_D: Equip and place the Furnace Base in a Beaconed area
Place a Furnace Crucible on a Furnace Base
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_FURNACE_S: Feel the heat, build a Furnace. Adding heat to your Crafting capabilities opens a whole range of possibilities - cooking Food, smelting metal Ores and discovering new Recipes. Both a Furnace Base and Furnace Crucible are needed to create a working Furnace. You can use basic Fuels like Wood and Peaty Soil to fuel a Furnace; however Coal will be a far more efficient Fuel if you can find it.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_IRON_FURN: Equip and place the Iron Furnace Base in a Beaconed area
Place an Iron Furnace Crucible on an Iron Furnace Base to make a Furnace
Add Fuel to an Iron Furnace
Craft an Item in an Iron Furnace

Turn up the heat and build an Iron Furnace for faster Furnace Crafting. Cook faster, Smelt faster, Craft faster. You'll need an Iron Furnace Base and Iron Crucible to create this much improved Furnace option. You can use basic Fuels like Wood and Peaty Soil to fuel a Furnace; however Coal will be a far more efficient Fuel if you can find it.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_MIXER_DES: Connect the Mixer to a Spark Generator
Craft an Item in a Mixer
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_MIXER_SUM: Cause a stir, Build a Mixer; an essential Machine for creating Brews, Food and other important Recipes. It would be hard to obtain certain Forge Ingredients without it!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_REFINERY_: Connect the Refinery to a Spark Generator
Craft an Item in a Refinery

Give your Beacons and Settlements a more refined feel with some extra shine and polish. A Refinery allows you to give raw Materials that extra sparkle needed to Craft more ornate Objects and Items in other Machines.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_SPARK_COR: Place a Spark Generator in a Beaconed area
Connect a Machine to a Spark Generator
Add Fuel to a Spark Generator to generate Spark
Craft an Item which requires Spark

Spark, the Crafter's choice. Certain Recipes require a little something extra to be made efficiently. Get more Power from your Machines by generating Spark inside Spark Generators which can be connected to Machines with Spark Links. Spark Generators can be combined to create a Spark Generator Hub, increasing the amount of Spark stored, the result? More Power for longer. Spark Generators are Crafted in a Workbench or through trade with other Players.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_TITANIUM_: Equip and place the Titanium Furnace Base in a Beaconed area
Place a Titanium Furnace Crucible on a Titanium Furnace Base to make a Furnace
Add Fuel to a Titanium Furnace
Craft an Item in the Titanium Furnace

Turn the heat right up to the max with a Titanium Furnace. Craft, Cook or Smelt everything you can in more basic Furnaces but with much quicker results. Still takes the same Fuel, Wood, Peaty Soil and Coals but uses them far more efficiently.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_CREATE_WORKBENCH: Craft an Item in the Workbench

Boost your Crafting prowess with a Workbench. Giving you the opportunity to Craft with stronger, more durable Resources, the Workbench is crafted using Ancient Tech Remnant. Whilst common, these Remnants are mainly found deep in mountainous areas and can be tricky to obtain. Remember however, that all Items can be traded for with other Players.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_EXTRACTOR_UPGRAD: Place the Power Coil next to the Extractor
Craft a Recipe which requires Power in the Extractor

For more efficient Extraction you'll need more Power, especially if you want to unlock and Craft more advanced Extractor Recipes. Place an Extractor Power Coil next to your Extractor to provide it with Power. More Power? Add additional Power Coils next to the Extractor to speed up the Crafting process.
Acquire an Advanced Extractor Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Extractor
Complete Extractor Advanced Power Coil upgrade
Craft a Recipe which requires over 2,400 Power using the Extractor

Provide your Extractor with even more Power and take up less room with an Advanced Power Coil. Place an Advanced Extractor Power Coil next to the Extractor to provide it with extra Power and unlock even more advanced Recipes. The more Advanced Power Coils you have connected to the Extractor, the more Power it will generate.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FORGE_INGREDIENT: Some Centraforge Ingredients are harder to Craft than others, but can be particularly Potent when used in the Forging Process. Many Advanced Centraforge Ingredients require incredibly rare Resources to Craft using more advanced Machines.

The Centraforge is a highly Advanced Machine which allows Citizens to customise their Tools and Weapons with unique Traits. It has its very own special set of Ingredients that cannot be used anywhere else. You'll need to Craft your Centraforge Ingredients in other Machines before you can use them in the Forging Process, any every one will affect Gear Forging in a different way. Don't despair! You can see what each Ingredient does by rolling over it in the Centraforge Ingredients Deck.
How do you like them Centraforge Ingredients?
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FORGE_ITEMS_DESC: Add Ingredients to the Centraforge Ingredients Deck
Drop a Deck Ingredient into the Centraforge Core and start a Round
Continue to add Deck Ingredients or add a Resin to complete the Forge process
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FORGE_ITEMS_SUMM: The Forging process takes place over a number of Rounds. At the beginning of each Round, you can add one Ingredient from the Centraforge Ingredients Deck into the spinning Core. This Ingredient can improve the chances of adding a Boon, Perk or Defect to the Gear being Forged. Beware, each Round reduces the Gear's Stability, if Stability reaches zero the Item may be destroyed.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FORGE_UPGRADE_1_: Place the Power Coil next to the Centraforge

You don't need to power up your Centraforge to use it, but you'll certainly get better results if you do. Placing a Centraforge Power Coil next to the Centraforge will provide the Power needed to complete more advanced Forges. Adding more Centraforge Power Coils will increase the amount of Power provided to the Centraforge.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FORGE_UPGRADE_2_: Acquire an Advanced Centraforge Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Centraforge
Complete Centraforge Advanced Power Coil upgrade

Have an even better Forge experience by powering your Centraforge with an Advanced Power Coil. Takes up less room than a standard Power Coil, is more efficient and unlocks the ability to Forge more effectively.The more Advanced Power Coils you have connected to the Centraforge, the more Power it will generate.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FUEL_MACHINE_DES: Use Wood to Fuel a Machine
Use Peaty Soil to Fuel a Machine
Use Coal to Fuel a Machine
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_FUEL_MACHINE_SUM: Unless you're Handcrafting or using a Crafting Table, you'll need plenty of Fuel to Craft in Machines. There are many types of Fuel dotted around the Known Worlds, you just need to find them and use them to get the most out of your Machines.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_MIXER_UPGRADE_1_: Place the Power Coil next to the Mixer
Craft a Recipe which requires Power in the Mixer

Mix more in a Mixer with a Power Coil upgrade. Placing a Mixer Power Coil next to your Mixer will provide it with Power and unlock more advanced Recipes for you to Craft. More Power Coils means more Power, speeding up the Crafting process.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_MIXER_UPGRADE_2_: Acquire an Advanced Mixer Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Mixer
Complete Mixer Advanced Power Coil upgrade
Craft a Recipe which requires over 2,400 Power using the Mixer

Mix even more by adding an Advanced Mixer Power Coil to your Mixer. It's small, efficient and gives you even more advanced Crafting options. Place an Advanced Mixer Power Coil next to the Mixer to provide increased Power and remember the more Advanced Power Coils you have connected to the Mixer, the more Power it will generate.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_REFINERY_UPGRADE: Place the Power Coil next to the Refinery
Craft a Recipe which requires Power in the Refinery

Up your Refinery game with a Power Coil and unlock the Power to Craft more advanced Recipes. Place a Refinery Power Coil next to a Refinery to provide it with Power. Want faster Crafting? Add additional Power Coils to increase the amount of Power provided to the Refinery.
Acquire an Advanced Refinery Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Refinery
Complete Refinery Advanced Power Coil upgrade
Craft a Recipe which requires over 2,400 Power using the Refinery

Take the opportunity to Refine even more with an Advanced Refinery Power Coil. It's more efficient, takes up less room in your Beacon than a non-advanced Power Coil and unlocks even more advanced Recipes. Place an Advanced Refinery Power Coil next to the Refinery to generate more Power and remember, the more Advanced Refinery Power Coils you have connected, the more powerful your Refinery will be.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_REPAIR_MACHINE_D: Use a Spanner to repair a Machine
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_REPAIR_MACHINE_S: Give your Machines the once-over. Most Machines gain wear and tear when crafting, without proper maintenance they will eventually break. A Spanner is just the Tool for keeping your Machines in top condition for longer. Equip a Spanner before interacting with a Machine to repair any broken parts.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_CRAFTER_WORKBENCH_UPGRAD: Place the Power Coil next to the Workbench
Craft a Recipe which requires Power in the Workbench

A Workbench with more Power is a Workbench with more prowess. Power Coils are your friend if you're looking to Craft ever more advanced Recipes. Place a Workbench Power Coil next to your Workbench to provide it with Power. Need more Power? Add additional Power Coils next to the Workbench.
Acquire an Advanced Workbench Power Coil
Place the Advanced Power Coil next to the Workbench
Complete Workbench Advanced Power Coil upgrade
Craft a Recipe which requires over 2,400 Power using the Workbench

Get even more Crafting potential from your Workbench, with an Advanced Power Coil; The smaller more effective Power solution. Place an Advanced Workbench Power Coil next to the Workbench to provide it with even more Power and unlock the ability to Craft even more advanced Recipes. Add more Advanced Power Coils to your Workbench, to generate even more Power.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAILY_LOGINS_SUMMARY: For each day you continue to play Boundless, you will be rewarded with a Daily Activity Bonus. To complete the Feat you must be active for a certain period of time before the daily timer expires.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAILY_XP_EARNED_SUMMARY: Earn the targeted amount of Experience Points before the daily time limit expires to receive a bonus. Experience Points can be earned by performing certain actions or by completing Objectives, Feats and Contracts.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAMAGE_REDUCED_1_DESCRIP: Total Damage reduced from Creature Attacks
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAMAGE_REDUCED_2_DESCRIP: Total Damage reduced from Creature Attacks

GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAMAGE_RESISTED_4_DESCRI: Total Damage resisted from Creature Attacks
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DAMAGE_RESISTED_5_DESCRI: Total Damage resisted from Creature Attacks
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DEBUFF_OTHERS_1_DESCRIPT: Total Debuffs time reduced on other Citizens
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DEBUFF_OTHERS_2_DESCRIPT: Total Debuffs time reduced on other Citizens
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DEBUFF_OTHERS_3_DESCRIPT: Total Debuffs time reduced on other Citizens
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DEBUFF_OTHERS_4_DESCRIPT: Total Debuffs time reduced on other Citizens
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_DEBUFF_OTHERS_5_DESCRIPT: Total Debuffs time reduced on other Citizens
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_ATLAS_DESCRIPTI: Discover all Regions on the Atlas
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_ATLAS_SUMMARY: Discover some Regional flavour with an Atlas. Once you've acquired an Atlas, you can use it to build up a picture of the World it is synchronised to by finding different Regions. Each time you enter a new Region, it appears on the Atlas, whilst undiscovered areas will remain blank. It's a great Tool for deciding where to go exploring next!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAPITAL_DESCRIP: Travel to the Capital Settlement of your Current World
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAPITAL_SUMMARY: Take a tour of the Capitals, the largest and most prestigious Settlements on each Known World. Capital Cities are populated by other Player Citizens who contribute to the area by Building Shops, houses and unique monuments for others to discover. To find the Capital on your Current World, navigate using the yellow symbol on the Compass. Capital Cities on other Known Worlds can be seen by pointing your Totem at another World in the sky.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAUSTIC_DESCRIP: Increase Caustic Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and has a Caustic Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAUSTIC_HARD_DE: Increase Caustic Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and has a Caustic Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAUSTIC_HARD_SU: Caustic Atmospheres can have even stronger detrimental effects on Citizens when experienced on more dangerous Corrosion and Toxin Worlds. You'll need stronger Protection to survive. Defeat in severe Atmospheres comes quickly and you'll need to make sure you have plenty of Protective Food and a good level of Caustic Atmosphere Protection Skills before travelling.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_CAUSTIC_SUMMARY: Caustic Atmospheres are found on Corrosion and Toxic Worlds and they are very harmful to Citizens who don't have the right type of Protection. You'll need to make sure your Caustic Atmosphere Protection is tip-top to survive, so stock your Inventory with the right type of Protective Foods, increase your Atmosphere Skills and go survive!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_DORMANT_METEORI: Finding craters with a mysterious Rock inside it but no hoard of Creatures? You've found the remnants of a once Active Meteorite which recently crashed down on the World; its energy has already been drained leaving it vulnerable to passing scavengers. Use your Tools to break through the Meteorite Core and reap its rewards.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_NEUTRAL_DESCRIP: Increase Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and with a Hazardous Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_NEUTRAL_HARD_DE: Increase Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and with a Hazardous Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_NEUTRAL_HARD_SU: Travelling to less hospitable Worlds may see you exposed to particularly severe Atmospheres. Find a World with a Hazardous Atmosphere that offers a more difficult Challenge. Remember, you'll need to increase your resistance to the effects of non-elemental Hazardous Atmospheres before you Travel or you will suffer Defeat quickly.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_NEUTRAL_SUMMARY: Amongst the Known Worlds, you will find Planets with Hazardous Atmospheres. These Atmospheres are dangerous and travelling there without the right Protection will lead to Defeat. Hazardous Atmospheres may be non-elemental, but they are no less harmful. To survive, you will need to find a way to increases your resistance to Hazardous Atmospheres, be that through Food or Skill advancement.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_PORTAL_TRAVEL_D: Travel through a Portal to another World
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_PORTAL_TRAVEL_S: A unique piece of Technology which allows Citizens to seamlessly Travel from one Location to another, however great the distance, even across Worlds. You can use the Compass to find active Portals, shown with a purple icon. You can simply walk through an active Portal, but it's worth investigating where the Portal takes you before travelling, you could be about to enter a very dangerous World.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_POTENT_DESCRIPT: Increase Potent Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and with a Potent Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_POTENT_HARD_DES: Increase Potent Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and has a Potent Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_POTENT_HARD_SUM: Potent Atmospheres can be even more severe on very dangerous Shock or Chill Worlds. You'll need stronger Protection to survive long enough to collect rare Gems and Defeat some aggressively Elemental Creatures. Defeat by severe Atmosphere comes quickly and you'll need to keep your Inventory stocked with Protective Foods. Increasing your Potent Atmosphere Protection Skills is a must!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_POTENT_SUMMARY: A Potent Atmosphere will have you Defeated by Shock or Chill Damage in no time, unless you have the right type of Protection! The thing is Potent Atmospheres tend to hang around on less hospitable Shock and Chill-type Worlds, where the Resources are a little rarer and the Creatures are a little more Elemental. Remember, you'll need to Protect yourself by consuming Protective Foods along with increasing your Atmosphere Skills.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_REGION_SUMMARY: Each Known World has many Regions for you to discover. Use your Compass to help you navigate towards a Region. Once you have discovered a Region the area will be unlocked on the Atlas when you activate it.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_SANCTUM_DESCRIP: Set a new Destination on the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_SANCTUM_SUMMARY: Stuck between a rock and a hard place? Occasionally, exploring the Known Worlds can leave you trapped in deep caves, stranded in a hole or even lost in the vast wilderness. Choosing 'return to the sanctum' in the Options Menu can mean the difference between success and Defeat. From the sanctum, either travel through the open Warp to appear close to your previous location, or interact with the closed Warp Conduit to set a different Destination.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_SETTLEMENT_SUMM: Many of The Known Worlds are peppered with Settlements for you to discover. Made entirely by its Citizens, each Settlement is unique in its style and contents. If you wish to save a Settlement's Location so you can return to it another time, go in to the Settlement save your Current Location in the Places Menu.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_TRAVEL_SET_LOCA: Travel to a Location you have tracked on the Compass

Navigating is easy with a Compass! To set a Destination, choose a Place from your Locations, Beacons or Settlements lists in the Places Menu, then select SET AS DESTINATION. Track your Destination on the Compass to navigate back to interesting Places, unusual Creatures and much needed Resources without paying the cost of Warping.
East is East and West is West
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_VOLATILE_DESCRI: Increase Volatile Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and has a Volatile Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_VOLATILE_HARD_D: Increase Volatile Atmosphere Protection using Skills or Food
Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST} and has a Volatile Atmosphere
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_VOLATILE_HARD_S: More Dangerous Blast and Burn Worlds are prone to more severe Volatile Atmospheres. To survive, you'll need to increases your resistance to Volatile Atmospheres, either by consuming Protective Foods or increasing your Volatile Atmosphere Protection Skills; sometimes you may need to use both in combination. Travel onwards and see how long you can survive!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_VOLATILE_SUMMAR: Certain Atmospheres are Volatile in nature and will quickly cause harm to Citizens who do not have the right type of Protection. Volatile Atmospheres are found on Worlds which have Blast and Burn characteristics and to survive them you'll need Protective Foods that Combat Blast and Burn Damage along with a good level of Volatile Atmosphere Protection Skills.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_ELEMENTAL_: Travel through a Warp to an Elemental World
Discover a Region on an Elemental World

You've made and travelled through your first Warp Conduits and now it's time to put your new found travelling skills to the test on more forbidding Worlds. First you'll need to travel to a less hospitable World and Save a Location (or Build a Beacon if you wish), you'll then be able to build a Warp Conduit and travel back to that Location whenever you want to.
A Warp on the Elemental Side
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_SPECIAL_DE: Travel through a Warp to a Special World
Discover a Region on a Special World
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_SPECIAL_SU: Certain Worlds that you'll Warp to are classed as Special. You'll need particularly tough Gear to Defeat Creatures on these Worlds, but you will gain access to great sources of Blink, Rift and Darkmatter, all highly prized amongst Known Worlders. Remember to Save a Location when you get there, you'll definitely want to come back for more Resources.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_2_DES: Travel through a Warp to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Discover a Region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_2_SUM: You've made and travelled through your first Warp Conduits and now it's time to put your new found travelling skills to the test on more forbidding Worlds  First you'll need to travel to a less hospitable World and Save a Location (or Build a Beacon if you wish), you'll then be able to build a Warp Conduit and travel back to that Location whenever you want to.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_3_DES: Travel through a Warp to ${TIER_LIST} World
Discover a Region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_3_SUM: The Known Worlds are out there, ripe for exploration. The more Worlds you travel to and Save Locations on, the more places you can Warp to and the more Resources you'll have access to. Try travelling to a World that's less hospitable in nature, saving your Location and Warping back to it. Then go exploring!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_4_DES: Travel through a Warp to ${TIER_LIST} World
Discover a Region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_4_SUM: You're getting the hang of Warping, so it's time to Warp to a harsher World. Travel on, save locations and discover new Regions wherever you go.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_5_DES: Travel through a Warp to ${TIER_LIST} World
Discover a Region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_5_SUM: Continue Warping to harder Worlds to gain access to rarer Resources and combat fiercer Creatures. Remember, you'll struggle to find certain Resources on more hospitable Worlds, unless you're willing to buy, buy, buy.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_6_DES: Travel through a Warp to ${TIER_LIST} World
Discover a Region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_6_SUM: Try Warping to an even harder World to discover even rarer Resources and Creatures who definitely don't want you there! Saving a location when you get there, will mean you can Warp back and take advantage of those Rare Resources whenever you like or put your Combat Skills to the test.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_6_TIT: Warp Just a Little Bit More
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_7_DES: Travel through a Warp to ${TIER_LIST} World
Discover a region on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_7_SUM: Take a Warp to a World which can only be described as not very hospitable at all. Here the Creatures are very aggressive and hard to conquer, but that's far outweighed by the Resources you'll find there. Remember to Save a Location so you can get back there in a flash.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TIER_7_TIT: Take a Warp on the Wild Side
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_EXPLORER_WARP_TO_FRIEND_: Add a Friend to your Friends list
Place and connect Warp Conduit Blocks:
Open Warp to your Friend's Location

A Friend in need is a Friend indeed. Exploring Worlds with your allies is a rewarding way to discover the Universe, especially when you can Warp to each other's aid. To quick visit a Friend, build a Warp Conduit and select Open Warp on your chosen Friend in the Warp Conduit Menu, Friends Tab. No one to visit? Find and interact with other Citizens to unlock the 'Add as Friend' option.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_ATLAS_DESCRIPTI: Add a Drop from a Plant to the Atlas
Use the Atlas to locate a Plant and Harvest it
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_ATLAS_SUMMARY: Got the hang of finding Resources using the Atlas? Use it now to gather a Plant. You don't need to have a Plant in your Inventory to find one using an Atlas. Place any Drop collected from a Plant onto the Atlas and that will show you where Plants which hold those Resources are located.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_BUCKET_DESCRIPT: Equip and use an Empty Bucket near a body of Water
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_BUCKET_SUMMARY: You can take a Bucket to water but you can't make it drink, you can fill it though! Head to a body of water with a few Empty Buckets and gather this essential Food-making Ingredient.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_1_DES: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Collect Foliage on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:

Collect Edible Lamellae on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Fibrous Leaves on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_1_SUM: Ready for another Gatherer Challenge? This time you'll need to Gather more than before and complete your Harvesting without being Defeated. Maybe a more hospitable World is a good place to start! Grab some sturdy Gear and a bunch of Consumables to keep you in tip-top condition whilst you take the Challenge. Remember, If you suffer Defeat you'll have to start the Challenge again.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_2_DES: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}

Collect Mud on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:

Collect Saltpetre Fragments on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:

Collect Vital Orbs on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_2_SUM: You've survived your first World Gatherer Survival Challenge, but can you survive the Challenge on a tougher World? You'll need tough Gear and Consumables to survive. Travel to a tougher World and see if you can Harvest and survive. Defeat means you'll need to start again.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_3_DES: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Collect Sponge on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Ash on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Raw Exotic Earthyams on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:

Collect Reactive Lamellas on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Sulphur Fragments on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Spicy Beans on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Collect Shimmering Orbs on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_3_SUM: Can you Harvest and survive on an even more dangerous World? Gather even rarer Items in a dangerous environment and survive without Defeat. You'll need your wits about you, sturdy Gear and a few Consumables to get your Citizen through.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_4_DES: Collect Thorns on an Elemental World:
Collect Tangle on an Elemental World:
Collect Sweet Beans on an Elemental World:
Collect Inky Leaves on an Elemental World:
Collect Petals on an Elemental World:
Collect Olivine Fragments on an Elemental World:
Collect Pulsating Orbs on an Elemental World:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_4_SUM: Gather more, survive more. Take a trip to an Elemental World and Gather what is asked of you. Some Items are rarer than others and may take some finding. Remember to keep your wits about you, your Gear strong and your Inventory packed with Consumables.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_5_DES: Collect Mould on a Special World:
Collect Growth on a Special World:
Collect Glowing Lamellae on a Special World:
Collect Bitter Beans on a Special World:
Collect Ancient Corruption on a Special World:
Collect Cobalt Fragments on a Special World:
Collect Shadow Orbs on a Special World:
Escape to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CHALLENGE_5_SUM: Face your toughest Gathering Survival Challenge yet by travelling to a Blink, Rift or Darkmatter World. The Items you'll need to gather are rarer than before, as are the Creatures that will try to Defeat you. Gather, gather, gather and survive! Remember, Defeat means you'll have to start your Challenge all over again.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_COMMON_FUNGUS_S: There's more than meets the eye to those Fungi you see dotted around the Known Worlds. They're packed with interesting and valuable Resources for you or other Crafters to use, and the odd one has edible parts. They're often found in Woodland Regions and occasionally in caves. Keep on the lookout for Fungi and Gather them when you can.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_COMMON_PLANTS_S: Plants may carry useful Resources, but they also make lovely decorations for your Beacon. To Harvest a Plant as well as the Resources it carries, you'll need to work with a Shovel. Any other Tool may break the Plant and prevent it from being collected.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_CORRUPTED_SUMMA: Stories are told amongst Known Worlders of Citizens suffering untold dangers in the presence of certain types of Blocks. Moulds, Growths and the suspiciously named Ancient Corruption may cause harm to nearby Citizens. Go find some dangerous Blocks, but be careful!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_ELEMENTAL_WORLD: Harvest Wood Trunks on an Elemental World:
Harvest Fungi on an Elemental World:
Harvest Plants on an Elemental World:

Great! You've survived Harvesting Items on dangerous Worlds, now it's time to get Elemental. Creatures here, and even the Atmosphere can be particularly damaging to Citizens, so Harvest wisely and keep an eye on your Health bar!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_EXTREME_WORLD_D: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Harvest Wood Trunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Fungi on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Plants on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_EXTREME_WORLD_S: Can you Gather in a more extreme environment? Travel to a more Dangerous World type and Harvest some more. Remember the more extreme the World, the more dangers you will face. Expect interruptions from aggressive Creatures!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_FLOWERS_SUMMARY: A few Flowers can turn a basic Base into a stylish (and more colourful) one! Throughout the Known Worlds you'll find various Flowers which can be gathered and placed inside your Beacon. All you need is a Shovel and a little Inventory space. Try collecting as many different types of Flowers as you can and use them to brighten up your Beacon.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_MOON_WORLD_DESC: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Harvest Wood Trunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Fungi on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Plants on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_MOON_WORLD_SUMM: You're Gathering skills are improving and it's time to take them on tour with a little World hopping Challenge or two. Try Harvesting on more hospitable Worlds to begin with, let the Challenges begin.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_MUD_SUMMARY: Your Knowledge continues to grow as you discover more throughout the Known Worlds. Every Block matters, even the seemingly mundane. Head out to find some Mud and Ash, it may sound simple, but the more Citizens learn, the better they will survive.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_RARE_FUNGUS_SUM: There are many forms of Fungus throughout the Known Worlds, but some are more elusive than others. It might be because other Citizens' have heard of their potent Crafting potential or because they require specific conditions to grow. Make sure you keep a lookout on your travels, you never know where you might spot a rarer Fungi.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_RARE_PLANTS_SUM: Rarer Plants carry rarer Resources and are really rather decorative too! Head out and discover rarer Plants, but remember, you'll need to use a Shovel if you want to keep the Plants intact.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_RING_WORLD_DESC: Travel to a World that is ${TIER_LIST}
Harvest Wood Trunks on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Fungi on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
Harvest Plants on a World that is ${TIER_LIST}:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_RING_WORLD_SUMM: You've taken your first World Gatherer Challenge, are you ready for more? Travel to a tougher World and Harvest away! Remember, you'll face more dangers whilst Harvesting here.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SAND_SUMMARY: Sand, Sand everywhere, gathering here and gathering there. Get a little extra Knowledge by Mining and Gathering Sand and Gravel, you may find a few useful Resources as you do.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SAND_TITLE: A Song of Sand and Gravel
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SOIL_SUMMARY: Soil, grower of Grass, carry of certain root-based Foods. It can also prove to be a useful Crafting Ingredient and in some cases a Fuel for certain Machines. Grab a Shovel and see what you can find below the Grass.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SPECIAL_WORLD_D: Harvest Wood Trunks on a Special World:
Harvest Fungi on a Special World:
Harvest Plants on a Special World:
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SPECIAL_WORLD_S: Your final World Gatherer Challenge will take you to a Special World. Travel to a Blink, Rift or Darkmatter World and get your Gathering on. Watch out for very dangerous Creatures whilst you're there!
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_SURFACE_ADVANCE: Acquire a Shovel and activate the relevant Skill
Use a Shovel to dig up a Fungus
Use a Shovel to dig up a Plant
Use a Shovel to dig up a Boulder
Place a Plant inside a Beacon
Place a Boulder inside a Beacon

Ever wanted to Mine a Surface Resource for Drops but also keep the Fungus, Plant or Boulder intact too? You can! You'll need to unlock a special Gathering Skill, and alway use a Shovel to Harvest them. Any other Tool may destroy the Surface Resource. Successfully collecting Surface Resources means you have more stuff to decorate your Beacon with, but remember, Mining the same Surface Resource again won't give you more Drops.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_THORNS_SUMMARY: Certain types of Blocks can seem a little Prickly to Citizens, go out and Harvest some now. Maybe you could use them to give your Beacons a bit of a prickly edge
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_TREES_SUMMARY: An Axe is best used for chopping down Trees, Trunks and Foliage, but that's not all it'll reveal. Sometimes Trees hold other Resources and special materials, but you'll never know unless you chop, chop, chop! The more dangerous the World the higher your chance of getting rarer Items, but it also depends on luck. Grab an Axe and go see what Resources are hiding in Trees.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_TREE_COLOURS_DE: Acquire Wood Trunks of eight different colours
Acquire Foliage of eight different colours
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_TREE_COLOURS_SU: The Known Worlds are colourful places, as are the Blocks that fill them. Many Blocks of the same type can be found in many colours. Go out and Harvest Trunks and Foliage from Trees in eight different Colours.
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_GATHERER_ULTRA_RARE_PLAN: You've added common Plants and some rarer Plants to your Knowledge. Now, it's time to hunt down the rarest of Plants. Use them to decorate your Beacons and discover some scarcer Resources too. Remember, to Harvest Plants along with their Resources you'll need to use a Shovel; no other Tool will do.

GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_METEORITES_COLLECTED_2_T: It Fell From The Sky II
GUI_ACHIEVEMENT_METEORITES_COLLECTED_3_T: It Fell From The Sky III
