Fill the Focus Bar by dealing more Damage to Creatures or by Healing other Citizens. Consume a Focus Brew to temporarily activate your Focus Skill and trigger Focusing. The more Focus you have accumulated, the more effective Focusing will be.
GUI_TIP_FOCUS_FAST_DESCRIPTION: After consuming a Focus Brew with enough Focus Accumulated and the necessary Skill unlocked, your Citizen will enter a state where their Action Speed and Movement Speed are increased. The effectiveness of Quickening is based on the amount of Focus accumulated at the time the Focus Brew is consumed.
GUI_TIP_FOCUS_GENERATION_DESCRIPTION: The more Damage you deal, the more Focus you generate. Accrued Focus is converted into special abilities when you consume Focus Brews.
GUI_TIP_FOCUS_STRONG_DESCRIPTION: A Focus-induced Buff which temporarily increases the Damage and Healing potential of your Citizen. After consuming a Focus Brew, with enough Focus Accumulated and the necessary Skill unlocked, your Citizen will receive more effective Damage and Healing potential. The more Focus accumulated the stronger Precise Strikes will be.
GUI_TIP_FOOD_BUFFS_DESCRIPTION: You are what you eat and certain Foods give temporary Buffs. Eating the same Food again refreshes Buff duration, whilst eating a different meal replaces your current Buff.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_BOONS_DESCRIPTION: The Ingredients you have used have resulted in a Boon being applied to the Gear. Boons give positive effects to Forged Gear which can improve its use and effectiveness.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION: Many Centraforge Ingredients reduce Item Stability during Forging. Reaching zero Stability fails your current Forge and causes the Item to be lost. Some Ingredients can improve Item Stability. Consider using these when Stability is low.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_DEFECTS_DESCRIPTION: The Ingredients you have used have resulted in a Defect being applied to the Gear. Defects can impact the Gear's use and effectiveness, but in combination with Boons and Quirks might prove to be useful.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_DESCRIPTION: The Centraforge is a complex Crafting Machine which requires Skill and experience to modify Items effectively. It requires a Weapon or Tool and various Forging Ingredients to use.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: Forging fails when the Gear you are Forging reaches zero Stability. The Gear is destroyed.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_FINISH_DESCRIPTION: When you wish to end a Forge and collect your Forged Gear, you'll need to add a Resin to the Centraforge Core and perform another Round.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INGREDIENTS_DESCRIPTION: Different Centraforge Ingredients have different uses and effectiveness. Roll over an Ingredient in the Centraforge Ingredients Deck to view details on what it does, how much Vigour it requires and how it affects Item Stability.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INGREDIENT_EFFECTS_DESCRIP: Different Ingredients affect your Gear Forging in different ways. Make sure you check out the Ingredients information to see what it can do.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_INPUTS_DESCRIPTION: Add the Gear you wish to modify to the Forge Item section, then add the Ingredients to the Ingredients Deck. Remember to add Resin to the Deck as you'll need it to complete Forging.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_MOMENTUM_DESCRIPTION: The Effectiveness of the Forge process is based on your Gear's Flexibility, Machine's Power and Intelligence when starting to Forge. Higher Effectiveness means more Boon points for positive Traits. You can still Forge with a lower Effectiveness, but a good outcome will require higher-level Ingredients.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_OUTPUTS_DESCRIPTION: Successfully Forged Items can be found in the Centraforge Output section for you to claim.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_QUEUE_DESCRIPTION: Items need time to re-stabilise once a Resin is applied, these Items are held in the Centraforge Queue until the process is complete, then transferred to Centraforge Output.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_QUIRKS_DESCRIPTION: The Items you have used have resulted in a Quirk being applied to the Gear. Depending on your perspective, a Quirk gives a positive or negative effect on the Gear.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Flex is...Power is... and Int is... [PLACEHOLDER]
GUI_TIP_FORGE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTION: The Ingredients you have used have applied a Status Effect to the Centraforge Core. Roll over the Status Effect icon in the Status Effect bar, situated above the Centraforge Core to view its properties.
GUI_TIP_FORGE_TURNS_DESCRIPTION: Each time you add an Ingredient to the spinning section of the Centraforge, you'll need to activate a round to apply the properties of that Ingredient to the Gear. The results of using the Ingredient will be shown after the Round is complete.
GUI_TIP_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCRIPTION: The Friends tab shows information about your Friends and their status. To add more Friends, interact with them or add them to your ${PLATFORM} friend list.
GUI_TIP_FUELLING_YOUR_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Beacon Fuel is a crafted Item used to activate and power Beacons. To add Beacon Fuel, look at your Beacon Control and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to view the Menu, then add your Crafted Fuel to a Slot in the Fuel tab. If the Beacon expires its contents become vulnerable to other Players and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_FUEL_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Add Fuel to your Beacon Control to activate it and claim Land Plots.
GUI_TIP_FUEL_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Across the universe there are many forms of Fuel which all have different efficiencies. Try using Peaty Soil, Trunks, Timber and the different types of Coal to see their effects.
GUI_TIP_FULL_UP_DESCRIPTION: Keep Food close at hand to keep your Citizen in tip top condition. When a Citizen has low Health they can consume Food to gain a Full Up Buff when their Energy is full. Full Up Buff keeps Energy topped up and promotes Health Regeneration when Energy levels are at their peak.
GUI_TIP_FURNACE_DESCRIPTION: The Furnace needs Fuel for crafting. To craft, place Fuel into the Fuel Slot and Ingredients into the Crafting Slot before selecting Start Furnace.
GUI_TIP_GEM_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Gems, not just sparkly and pretty. Find these rare Crafting Resource on specific Elemental Worlds.
GUI_TIP_GRAPPLE_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION:
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to fire the Grapple.
Press ${ACTION(GRAPPLE_BOTH_WIND_IN,GRAPPLE_BASE)} to ascend
Press ${ACTION(GRAPPLE_BOTH_WIND_OUT,GRAPPLE_BASE)} to descend.
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} again to release.
GUI_TIP_HANDCRAFTING_RECIPES_DESCRIPTION: Ready to Craft? Open the Inventory ${ACTION(GENERAL_OPEN_INVENTORY,PLAYING)}, select Handcraft then choose a Recipe to Instant Craft; the Item will be added to your Inventory. Uncraftable Recipe? Scavenge for Resources before returning to the Handcraft Menu.
GUI_TIP_HARVESTING_ITEMS_FROM_CREATURES_: Creature defeated! Hit the defeated Creature with a Tool or Weapon to Harvest drops.
GUI_TIP_HEALTHBAR_COLOURS_DESCRIPTION: Health Bar colour indicates the amount of Health a Citizen or Creature has. The order of colour from lowest to highest is green, blue, purple, orange and pink.
GUI_TIP_HEALTHBAR_SEGMENT_DESCRIPTION: Each segment of a Health Bar indicates the amount of Health a Citizen or Creature has left. The amount of Health per segment depends on the Health Bar colour.
GUI_TIP_HEAL_DESCRIPTION: Time Heals all things, but Heal Buffs heal them faster. When under the effect of Heal, your Citizen will recover Health over time for the duration of the Buff. The stronger the Buff, the more Health your Citizen will regain.
GUI_TIP_HEAVY_DESCRIPTION: It's Heavy going with a Heavy Debuff. Sufferers of Heavy will act like a hefty weight has been placed on them. Your Citizen will temporarily experience smaller Jump heights and receive more Damage from Falling. Stronger Debuffs have stronger effects.
GUI_TIP_HIT_ACTIVE_METEORITE_DESCRIPTION: Meteorites can be mined once Dormant. Deactivate them by defeating all Creatures arriving through the Meteorite's Portals.
GUI_TIP_HOLDING_FORGED_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: The Item has been Forged and contains single or multiple Boons, Quirks and Defects which can change how the Item performs, how it affects you and other interesting combinations.
GUI_TIP_HOOKSHOT_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION:
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to fire the Hookshot.
Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} again to release.
GUI_TIP_HOSTILE_CREATURES_DESCRIPTION: Certain Creatures are hostile and will attack if you get too close. Want to avoid combat? Move away from the Creature before it starts attacking you.
GUI_TIP_HUNGRY_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Performing actions increases Hunger which limits your maximum Energy. Consume food to reduce Hunger and restore Max Energy.
GUI_TIP_ICE_DESCRIPTION: Your Citizen won't be as cold as Ice, but they will feel like they're on it when suffering from Frozen. All surfaces will seem extremely slippy for the duration of the Debuff. The more powerful the Frozen Debuff, the more slippery surfaces will seem.
GUI_TIP_INNOCUOUS_DESCRIPTION: Innocuous Buff makes it harder for nearby Creatures to detect a Citizen. Perfect for avoiding combat and exploring in peace.
GUI_TIP_INTERACT_WITH_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTIO: To interact with another Citizen turn to face them and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)}. When both Players have accepted the Interaction, the Trade Menu will open.
GUI_TIP_INVIGORATE_DESCRIPTION: Have an invigorating experience with Invigorate Buff! Your Citizen will enjoy a temporary increase in Maximum Health for the duration of the Buff. Stronger Buffs provide stronger effects.
GUI_TIP_ITEMS_TO_COLLECT_DESCRIPTION: Some Items have been recovered and added to your Items Collection list.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_AUGMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Augments can be combined with certain Gear to provide temporary upgrades. To add an Augment select it in your Inventory and move it on to the Gear you wish to use it with.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_DESTROYED_DESCRIPTION: The ${ITEM} you were using has lost all Durability and has been destroyed.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_EJECT_DESCRIPTION: You can eject an Augment from Gear by selecting the Gear in your Inventory and pressing [input].
GUI_TIP_ITEM_NEEDS_A_BEACON_DESCRIPTION: Certain Blocks or objects can only be placed inside a Beacon which you own or are a Member of.
GUI_TIP_ITEM_TOO_WEAK_DESCRIPTION: The Tool you are using is too weak. Try acquiring a higher-quality Tool to break the Block.
GUI_TIP_KNOWLEDGE_DESCRIPTION: Where the mysteries of the Boundless Universe being to unfold. Consult the Knowledge frequently to learn about Items you've discovered and what Recipes you've unlocked.
GUI_TIP_KNOWLEDGE_UPDATED_DESCRIPTION: The Knowledge has been updated. Open the Character Menu and select Knowledge to view the newly added information.
GUI_TIP_LEDGE_CLIMB_DESCRIPTION: Jump towards the edge of a Block to perform a Ledge Climb.
GUI_TIP_LIGHT_DESCRIPTION: An odd sensation where you feel as light as a feather. When a Citizen is under the effects of Light, they are temporarily able to Jump higher and take less Damage from Falls.
GUI_TIP_LIGHT_TOUCH_DESCRIPTION: When under the effect of Light Touch, the wielder uses less Durability when they use Gear. The amount of Durability consumed is reduced further by the strength of the Buff.
GUI_TIP_LOCATION_PICKER_DESCRIPTION:
Orbiting above are the Known Worlds, ready for exploration. Look at the World above you, then hold
${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to jettison the Warp Augment and set your Landing Site. Warp Augments are one-shot Items, destroyed on impact.
GUI_TIP_LOW_DURABILITY_DESCRIPTION: When you are defeated, Items in your Inventory lose Durability. Accept Revives from other Citizens or upgrade your Survival Skills to improve Durability.
GUI_TIP_LUMINOUS_DESCRIPTION: Make like a firefly and glow, glow, glow! Luminous Buffs turns your Citizen's skin into a temporary light source, useful when travelling in dark places without a Torch or other glowing Item. A stronger Buff makes your Citizen emit more light.
GUI_TIP_MACHINE_DURABILITY_LOW_DESCRIPTI: This well-used Machine needs maintenance. Use a Spanner on the Machine to carry out repairs.
GUI_TIP_MACHINE_WORN_OUT_DESCRIPTION: This Machine is overused; it cannot function without maintenance. Equip and use a Spanner on the Machine to carry out repairs.
GUI_TIP_MANTLE_DESCRIPTION: You have reached the World's core. No Tool can break Mantle.
GUI_TIP_MASTER_BEACON_REMOVE_ERROR_DESCR: To remove a Master Beacon Control first remove any connected Plots and Secondary Beacon Controls placed within the Master Beacon area.
GUI_TIP_MASTER_BEACON_REMOVE_WARNING_DES: When you destroy a Master Beacon Control its controlled area returns to being unclaimed. Beacon contents become vulnerable to other Citizens and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_MERGING_SETTLEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: This Beacon bridges two or more Settlements. A Beacon can only be in a single Settlement. Ensure this Beacon is only connected to one Settlement to be included within it.
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_DEFEATED_LIFE_DESCRIPT: Protect your allies and still win the reward. Revive allies so they can keep their Meteorite Life.
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_DEFEATED_LIFE_TITLE: You have lost your Meteorite Life
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_ENTER_DESCRIPTION: At least one of your allies must survive the Meteorite Attack to gain its reward
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_ENTER_TITLE: You have gained a Meteorite Life
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_LOSING_LIFE_DESCRIPTIO: You will lose your Meteorite Life if you do not return to the Meteorite Zone.
GUI_TIP_METEORITE_LOSING_LIFE_TITLE: You are outside the Meteorite zone
GUI_TIP_NEGATIVE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTI: You have been hit with a negative Status Effect. Use certain Brews or Recharger Bombs to remove these effects or wait for them to expire.
GUI_TIP_NEW_CITIZEN_DESCRIPTION: The Central Clan has marked this individual as a New Citizen of the Known Worlds. To protect the individual and ensure they are ready for their journey, a temporary Boon has been applied which calms all nearby Creatures unless they are provoked. It also provides a constant source of light.
GUI_TIP_NEW_OBJECTIVE_DESCRIPTION: A new Objective is available. Press ${ACTION(OPEN_OBJECTIVES,PLAYING)} to open the Journal and view new Objectives.
GUI_TIP_NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Brighten a dark spot by holding a Torch or Light Cube. You can handcraft Torches using a few basic Ingredients.
GUI_TIP_OBJECTIVES_DESCRIPTION: Objectives are short term missions which can be completed for rewards and knowledge. View complete and unpinned Objectives in the Objectives tab.
GUI_TIP_ONE_HAND_SWAPPING_DESCRIPTION: You can choose to cycle Radial Menu objects in one or both hands using the Item Selection Radial Switching selector in the Settings Menu.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_BEACONS_DESCRIPTION: The Beacons tab tracks your Beacons and displays their most recent status for your to view. Each Beacon can be used as a Warp Destination.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: You can add a Location to your Locations tab at any time in the Places Menu. Add them to use as Compass Destinations, to Craft Location Markers or as Warp Destinations.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_SETTLEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: The Settlements tab tracks the Settlements you have visited. It shows the current Settlement Warden, Prestige value and other information.
GUI_TIP_PLACES_WORLDS_DESCRIPTION: The Worlds tab displays information about the Worlds you have visited including the top Settlements and Viceroy on each World.
GUI_TIP_PLACING_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} to place the Warp Conduit Block.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_GLYPHS_DESCRIPTION: Each World has a Glyph which indicates its difficulty level; the fewer the dots, the harder the World.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION: In the Inventory try placing a Resource on top of the Atlas to highlight where that Resource can be found. Lighter areas indicate a higher density of the Resource.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_SCANNER_EJECT_DESCRIPTION: In the Inventory, Press X on the Atlas to stop Resource Scanning. You will need an empty Inventory Slot for the Resource to return to. Try adding different Resources to the Atlas to discover where in the World you can find them.
GUI_TIP_PLANET_VIEWER_DESCRIPTION: Equip the Atlas then use it to synchronise it to your current World. Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} / ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to get a closer look at the World and see Regions that you've already discovered.
GUI_TIP_PLANTING_GRASS_DESCRIPTION: Placing Seed on a Soil Block plants Grass. Place multiple Seeds on the same Block to increase the amount of Grass.
GUI_TIP_PLAYER_GLYPHS_DESCRIPTION: The Glyph above your Health Bar represents your Citizen's current level. Other Citizens' levels are shown as a Glyph above their name.
GUI_TIP_PLOTS_DESCRIPTION: To claim a section of Land you'll first need to purchase Plots in the Exchange using Cubits. Plots allow you to build Beacons and Campfires and extend the reach of both. Plots assigned to a Campfire or Beacon are returned to you when they expire.
GUI_TIP_PLOT_VIEW_TOGGLE_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(TOGGLE_BUILDER_MODE,PLAYING)} to toggle Beacon Plot visibility. Builder Mode allows you to view Plot outlines to see which areas have and have not been plotted. Plots with black outlines belong to other Players.
GUI_TIP_POISON_DESCRIPTION: Toxin-type Creatures and Blocks may Poison their victims temporarily dealing Toxin Damage over time. The stronger the Poison the more Damage it will deal over time.
GUI_TIP_POOR_CONNECTION_DESCRIPTION: The connection quality is low. Try reducing your Chunk Download Rate in the Settings Menu and see if your connection improves.
GUI_TIP_PORTAL_STASIS_DESCRIPTION: Travelling through Warps or Portals can cause a temporary side effect which temporarily limits your abilities.
GUI_TIP_POSITIVE_STATUS_EFFECT_DESCRIPTI: You have been hit with a positive Status Effect. The effects are temporary and will expire when the timer runs out.
GUI_TIP_POWER_CORE_DESCRIPTION: Spark Generators provide Spark to high-tier Machines. Place and Fuel a Spark Generator to generate Spark then use Spark Links to connect Machines to the Spark Generator.
GUI_TIP_PROFILE_MENU_DESCRIPTION: Use the Profile Menu to view detailed information about your various Attributes and Statistics.
GUI_TIP_QUEUE_DESCRIPTION: You can Queue multiple Recipes in a Machine at once thanks to the Crafting Queue. Crafts are added to the Queue until complete. Active Recipes can be cancelled in the Queue tab; unused Items are returned to you.
GUI_TIP_QUICK_APPLY_AUGMENT_DESCRIPTION: You can quickly swap Augments without using the Inventory. Equip an Augment in one hand and valid Gear in the other, then use the Augment to instantly add it to the equipped Gear.
GUI_TIP_QUICK_EQUIP_DESCRIPTION: When viewing your Inventory or interacting with a Machine you can use ${ACTION(RUN,PLAYING)} and ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to quickly move Items.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_BOUNCY_FEET_DESCRIPTION: Need extra height in your Jumps? Challenge Gravity with Bouncy Feet Quirk! When holding Gear Forged with this Quirk your Citizen Jumps higher for longer.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_CREATURE_AGGRO_RANGE_INCRE: Are you built to survive and take a lot of Damage? You'll need to be with Aggravated Attacks Quirk which makes Creatures target you from further away. Using Gear Forged with this Quirk can be a blessing or a curse depending on your perspective!
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_DRAINS_HEALTH_DESCRIPTION: Fancy playing on the edge? How about a Quirk which reduces your Health when you use it? When a Forged Item has Bleeding Edge Quirk is equipped, the wielder will constantly lose Health. Use Gear with this Quirk sparingly or stock your Inventory with Health giving Items.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_DRAINS_HUNGER_DESCRIPTION: You'll need to eat and eat some more with Nutritionally Challenged Quirk. Anyone wielding Gear Forged with this Quirk will constantly lose Max Energy. Use Gear with this Quirk sparingly or stock up on Food in your Inventory!
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_FIRE_RANDOMLY_DESCRIPTION: An unfortunate Quirk which causes Gear Forged with it to fire or hit at Random. Unpredictable and occasionally hilarious.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_JUMP_RANDOMLY_DESCRIPTION: An erratic Quirk which makes you Jump randomly when wielding Gear Forged with it. It can be frustrating or useful, especially if it can bounce you away from an Attack.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_MAKES_ODD_SOUND_DESCRIPTIO: A super silly Quirk which makes Gear unfortunate enough to have it make Random Noises during use.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_SINK_IN_WATER_DESCRIPTION: Get That Sinking Feeling with the Quirk that gets you to the bottom of the lake faster. Could be seen as negative, but does get you to underwater Items and Resources quicker. Applies when holding Gear Forged with this Quirk. Remember, to return to the surface quicker you'll need to unequip that Gear.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_SLIPPERY_FEET_DESCRIPTION: A Quirk that has you sliding this way or that, but not necessarily in a negative way. On Icy Ground requires great skill and control to counter, but can be incredibly useful in combat, making it harder for Creatures to predict your movements.
GUI_TIP_QUIRK_SLOWS_YOU_DOWN_DESCRIPTION: Need to steady your aim before you take a shot? Slow-mo Quirk can be positive! When holding Gear Forged with this Quirk your Movement and Action Speed will be reduced.
GUI_TIP_RADIAL_MENU_CONTROLS_DESCRIPTION:
Hold ${ACTION(OPEN_QUICK_USE,PLAYING)} to open Radial Menu
Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to control left or right radials.
Release ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to equip highlighted Item.
Use ${ACTION(ITEM_PREVIOUS_NEXT,PLAYING)} to cycle through Items.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_BREW_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Rage Brews turn accumulated Rage into temporary Rage abilities. Unlock your Rage Skills in the Skill Tree before consuming a Rage Brew to convert generated Rage.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_DESCRIPTION: Unlocking Rage Skills allows your Citizen to accumulate Rage each time they receive Damage from Creatures. The more Damage you receive the fuller your Rage Bar will become and the more powerful the effect when you activate Raging. To activate Raging, consume a Rage Brew.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_GENERATION_DESCRIPTION: The more Damage you receive, the more Rage you generate. Accrued Rage is converted into special abilities when you use Rage Brews.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_HEAL_DESCRIPTION: A Rage-induced Buff which slowly regenerates Health. Consume a Rage Brew with enough Rage accumulated and the necessary Skill unlocked to allow your Citizen to temporarily restore health over time. The strength of Adrenaline Rush is based upon the amount of Rage accumulated when the Brew is consumed.
GUI_TIP_RAGE_SHIELD_DESCRIPTION: A Rage-induced Buff which temporarily increases your Citizen's Defence and Resistance against Kinetic and Impulse Damage. Consume a Rage Brew with enough Rage accumulated and the necessary Skill unlocked to receive a temporary protective Shield. The strength of Thick Skin is based on the amount of Rage accumulated at the time of consuming the Brew.
GUI_TIP_RAGING_DESCRIPTION: Rage Brews gets your Citizen Raging. A special state which activates your unlocked Rage Skills for the duration of the Buff. Citizens are unable to accumulate Rage whilst a Raging Buff is in effect.
GUI_TIP_RAPID_FIRE_DESCRIPTION: Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} or ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to perform Rapid Fire with a Slingbow.
GUI_TIP_RECIPES_DESCRIPTION: Each Recipe details the Ingredients required to craft a particular Item. Improve your crafting Skills with Skill Points to unlock more Recipes. You can also visit the Knowledge tab in the Character Menu to see other Recipes.
GUI_TIP_RECOVER_DESCRIPTION: Recover gets your Citizen's Energy back on the road to recovery faster. The stronger the Buff, the sooner your Citizen will Recover their Energy.
GUI_TIP_REGENERATE_BURST_STAMINA_DESCRIP: Each time you use a Tool or Weapon your Energy is temporarily depleted. When you run out of Energy you'll need to wait for it to recharge.
GUI_TIP_REGENERATE_HEALTH_DESCRIPTION: Damage reduces Health Points if you let them drop to zero you will be defeated. Consume Brews or Food to restore Health.
GUI_TIP_REPLAY_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: It appears you haven't visited the Boundless Universe for a while. Need a refresher? Select Tutorial in the Objectives Menu and choose Replay.
GUI_TIP_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: You can use the Report Menu for reporting bugs, user generated content or other Players.
GUI_TIP_RESTRICTED_AREA_DESCRIPTION: You cannot alter this area. Green highlighted areas show your land, red another Citizen's or restricted area and orange is unclaimed. You cannot place Blocks directly beneath you.
GUI_TIP_RESURRECTION_COOLDOWN_DESCRIPTIO: Reviving Citizens takes considerable Energy. Your Totem takes time to Recharge before you can use it again.
GUI_TIP_RESURRECTION_DESCRIPTION: Defeat is not the end! You can Revive or be Revived by other Citizens. Revive allows Citizens to recover from injuries and avoid returning to the sanctum. The amount of Health restored increases by the strength of the Revive.
GUI_TIP_REVIVE_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Use a Totem fitted with a Revive Augment to revive a Defeated Citizen. Fire the Revive Augment at them to Revive them.
GUI_TIP_ROTATE_MACHINES_DESCRIPTION: Machines, Furnishings and other decorative fixtures can be rotated by hitting them with a Chisel.
GUI_TIP_SCAR_DESCRIPTION: Scar temporarily reduces a Citizen's maximum Health for the duration of the Debuff. The stronger the Debuff the more Maximum Health will decrease.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_AWAY_FROM_GAME_DESCRIPTI: Items in your Shop Stands are always available for sale, even while you are away.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_PLINTH_BUYING_DESCRIPTIO: Face a Shop Stand and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to open it. Place any Items you wish to purchase into your Basket then select Confirm to spend your Coin.
GUI_TIP_SELLING_PLINTH_SETUP_DESCRIPTION: Face your Shop Stand and press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to open it. Add the Item type you wish to sell then set the price of the Item in the Price List.
GUI_TIP_SERVER_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION: The Boundless server will be undergoing maintenance on ${DAY} ${DAY_NO} of ${MONTH} at ${24HOUR} (UTC). During this time, play will be suspended. ${DURATION}
GUI_TIP_SERVER_MAINTENANCE_UNDER_HOUR_DE: The Boundless server will be undergoing maintenance in ${MINUTES} minutes. All play will be suspended at this time. ${DURATION}
GUI_TIP_SETTLEMENT_CAPITAL_DESCRIPTION: The most prestigious Settlement on a World is designated as the Capital. This is usually where many Citizens gather to trade, meet up and socialise.
GUI_TIP_SETTLEMENT_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Settlements are ranked on the amount of Prestige they carry; the more Prestigious a Settlement is the higher its ranking. The ranking are Outpost, Hamlet, Village, Town and finally City.
GUI_TIP_SET_LANDMARK_DESCRIPTION: You can track Saved Locations on the Compass by selecting a Location in the Places Menu then choosing Set as Destination.
GUI_TIP_SET_LANDMARK_TITLE: Setting A Landmark On The Compass
GUI_TIP_SHARING_LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Share Saved Locations with others by Crafting a Location Marker in the Places Menu. Give it to another Citizen to add to their Saved Locations.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_BLAST_DESCRIPTION: Shield Blast Buff helps to keep Damage from Blast Creature Attacks at bay by increasing Blast Armour and Resistance for the duration of the Buff. The effects of Shield Blast increases with the strength of the Buff.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_BURN_DESCRIPTION: Shield Burn Buff temporarily increases your Citizen's Armour and Resistance against Burn-type Damage. The effects of Shield Burn increases with the strength of the Buff.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_CHILL_DESCRIPTION: Keep out the cold with Shield Chill Buff and increase Armour and Resistance against Chill Damage for the duration of the Buff. The Stronger the Buff, the stronger its effects.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_CORROSION_DESCRIPTION: Shield Corrosion Buff protects your Citizen against Damage from Corrosive Creature Attacks by increasing Armour and Resistance for the duration of the Buff. The stronger the Buff, the stronger its effects.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_PHYSICAL_DESCRIPTION: When things get physical, Shield Physical protects your Citizen. Their armour and resistance becomes more effective against Kinetic and Impulse type attacks for the duration of the Buff. The stronger the Buff, the better the effects.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_SHOCK_DESCRIPTION: Take Shock Damage by surprise with Shield Shock Buff. When a Citizen under the effects of Shield Shock, their Armour and Resistance is increased against Shock Creature Damage. Stronger Buffs have stronger effects.
GUI_TIP_SHIELD_TOXIN_DESCRIPTION: When a Citizen is under the effects of Shield Toxin Buff, their Armour and Resistance is temporarily increased against Toxin Creature Damage. The stronger the Buff, the stronger its effect.
GUI_TIP_SHOUT_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can send a message to everyone on your Current World by starting your message with /sh or /shout.
GUI_TIP_SICK_DESCRIPTION: Consuming certain Raw or uncooked Foods can make a Citizen temporarily Sick resulting in gradual Damage over time. Prevent your Citizen from becoming Sick by getting your cook on!
GUI_TIP_SKILLS_MENU_DESCRIPTION: Each time your level increases you earn Skill Points which can be used to acquire new Skills, Abilities and Attributes in the Skills tab.
GUI_TIP_SKILL_POINTS_DESCRIPTION: Skill Points (SP) are awarded each time you level up. Spend SP in the Skill Menu to upgrade your Citizen. Open the Options Menu ${ACTION(GUI_ACTION_CLOSE,PLAYING)} then select Character to access the Skills Menu.
GUI_TIP_SKILL_POINT_AVAILABLE_DESCRIPTIO: You have unspent Skill Points. Press ${ACTION(OPEN_PROGRESSION,PLAYING)} to open the Character Menu and assign Skill Points in the Skills tab.
GUI_TIP_SLOW_DESCRIPTION: Slow temporarily reduces a Citizen's Movement Speed and Action Speed for the duration of the Debuff. The stronger the Slow Debuff the more Movement and Action Speed will decrease.
GUI_TIP_SMART_STACKING_ITEMS_AND_SPLITTI: In the Inventory, place matching Items on top of each other to Stack them. Hold ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to split a Stack, use ${ACTION(GENERAL_LOOKAT,PLAYING)} to choose the amount to split and release ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} to pick up the selected amount.
GUI_TIP_SMART_STACK_DESCRIPTION: When you have multiple Stacks or Items of the same type, a Smart Stack is created in your Inventory.
GUI_TIP_SPARK_CORD_LIMIT_DESCRIPTION: The Spark Link can only transfer Spark for a short distance from Spark Generator to Machine. Move your Machine and Spark Generator closer to connect them.
GUI_TIP_SPARK_CORES_LIMIT_DESCRIPTION: You have reached the maximum number of Spark Generators which can be connected. Any future Spark Generators placed will not be connected to the current group.
GUI_TIP_STACKING_ITEMS_AND_SPLITTING_DES: Press ${ACTION(ACTION_RIGHT_HAND,PLAYING)} on a Smart Stack to view its contents.
GUI_TIP_START_WORLD_FAILED_TO_CONNECT_DE: Your current World is unavailable. Please try again later or visit a different World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_STARVING_DESCRIPTION: Your Citizen needs to eat regularly to avoid Starvation. Once your Citizen is Starving, they'll receive Damage until they have consumed enough Food to prevent it.
GUI_TIP_STICKY_DESCRIPTION: A Sticky Buff which stops your Citizen sliding by when on icy terrain. A positive side effect of drinking a particularly Sticky Brew.
GUI_TIP_STORAGE_BOX_DESCRIPTION: A Storage Box or Shelf can be used to store Items. Place multiple Storage units next to each other to expand your Storage space.
GUI_TIP_STRONG_DESCRIPTION: Strong lets your Citizen go from strength to strength with increased Damage Dealing potential for the duration of the Buff. The more powerful the Buff, the stronger your Citizen.
GUI_TIP_SUFFOCATING_DESCRIPTION: You are running out of air, when it expires your Health will drain. Leave this planet to refresh your Air before your Health reaches zero.
GUI_TIP_SWITCHING_CHAT_CONTROLS_DESCRIPT: You can default to a specific Chat mode, like Shout or Say, by selecting the bottom left icon in the Chat Window. Future message will use the selected Chat Mode until changed.
GUI_TIP_TEMPORARY_CAMPFIRE_DESCRIPTION: Campfires temporarily claim an area of land and protect Items placed within it from outside dangers. Once burnt out, the contents of the Campfire become vulnerable to other Players and World Regeneration.
GUI_TIP_TIMBER_AND_STICKS_DESCRIPTION: Turn your Trunks into Timber and discover a basic yet versatile Ingredient for crafting Tools, Weapons and other Items.
GUI_TIP_TIMBER_DESCRIPTION: Timber, Handcrafted from Tree Trunks, essential for increased Crafting power. Sturdy, uncomplicated and the core Ingredient for making a Crafting Table.
GUI_TIP_TIPS_DESCRIPTION: Handy Tips like this one are stored in the Knowledge, Tips tab. Can't remember what to do? View your learned Tips to check how things work in the Boundless universe.
GUI_TIP_TOO_MANY_MESH_BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: There are too many Props placed in this area; if you wish to add new Props, you will need to remove some existing ones first.
GUI_TIP_TRACKER_DESCRIPTION: Use the Pinned tab in the Journal Menu to track a small number of Objectives.
GUI_TIP_UPGRADING_TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Press ${ACTION(GENERAL_OPEN_INVENTORY,PLAYING)} to open the Inventory. Combine the Totem with the Warp Augment.
GUI_TIP_USE_AXE_FOR_TREES_DESCRIPTION: Axes are best suited for chopping down organic Blocks such as Wood, Trunks, Foliage and Plants.
GUI_TIP_USE_BOMBS_FOR_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION: Standard Bombs deal Damage to enemies, but with a little tinkering in the Centraforge some may restore Health or Energy to your allies.
GUI_TIP_USE_HAMMER_FOR_ROCK_DESCRIPTION: Hammers are best suited for breaking Rocks, Seams and other strong Blocks. Harder materials need stronger Hammers to break them.
GUI_TIP_USE_SHOVEL_FOR_DIRT_DESCRIPTION: Shovels are best suited for collecting Soil, Gravel, Sand and other earth-like Blocks. Higher-tier Shovels are more durable.
GUI_TIP_USE_SLINGBOW_FOR_COMBAT_DESCRIPT: Slingbows are long-range Weapons ideal for targeting Creatures from afar. Upgrade to stronger Slingbow types to deal more Damage.
GUI_TIP_USING_EQUIPPED_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION:
Left in the dark? When holding the Light Cube press 
${ACTION(ACTION_LEFT_HAND,PLAYING)} to light your way.
GUI_TIP_VERY_HUNGRY_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Performing actions increases Hunger which limits your maximum Energy. Consume food to reduce Hunger and restore Max Energy.
GUI_TIP_WARPS_EXPLANATION_DESCRIPTION: Warps provide a one-way travel solution for reaching Places in your Locations, Beacons, Friends and Settlements Lists quickly. Once entered, Warps close behind the Citizen. Lost or in a sticky situation? Use the ${ACTION(GUI_ACTION_CLOSE,PLAYING)} Menu to return to the sanctum at any time.
GUI_TIP_WARP_CONDUITS_DESCRIPTION: The speedy answer to travelling the Known Worlds. Obtained through craft or trade, Warp Conduit Blocks are used to build Warp Conduits, allowing fast travel to Places added in your Locations, Beacons, Settlements and Friends lists.
GUI_TIP_WARP_DESTINATION_DESCRIPTION: Your Warp Conduit is complete. Look at the Conduit then press ${ACTION(INTERACT,PLAYING)} to interact with it and activate a Warp to your chosen destination.
GUI_TIP_WEAKENED_DESCRIPTION: After being defeated your body is temporarily weakened causing your Attributes bonuses to be reduced.
GUI_TIP_WEAK_DESCRIPTION: Your Citizen won't just go weak at the knees when experiencing Weak Debuff, they'll be Weak all over. The potential Damage dealt by your Citizen will be reduced for the duration of the Debuff. The stronger the effect of Weak, the more potential Damage Dealt will be reduced.
GUI_TIP_WELL_FED_DESCRIPTION: Food is a necessity for a Citizen's survival. Consuming a decent amount of Food gives your Citizen a Well Fed Buff which slows the rate of Energy loss for the duration of the Buff. Stronger Buffs provide stronger effects.
GUI_TIP_WHAT_IS_A_SELLING_PLINTH_DESCRIP: A Shop Stand allows Citizens to place Items up for sale for others to purchase with Coin.
GUI_TIP_WHAT_IS_BUYING_PLINTH_DESCRIPTIO: A Request Basket allows Citizens to exchange specific Items for Coin.
GUI_TIP_WHERE_TO_FIND_ROCKS_DESCRIPTION: Rocks, the tough alternative to Wood. Found on the side of mountains or underground, Rocks are best released using a Hammer. Trapped? Choose 'RETURN TO THE SANCTUM' in the Options Menu (OPTIONS button).
GUI_TIP_WORLD_FULL_DESCRIPTION: The World you are trying to connect to is full. Please try again later or visit a different World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION: The World you are trying to connect to is unavailable. Try again later or visit another World using the closed Warp Conduit in the sanctum.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_REGENERATION_DESCRIPTION: Block placed on unclaimed land. Worlds regenerate by removing and replacing unprotected Blocks; place a Beacon Control or extend Plots to prevent this.
GUI_TIP_WORLD_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: There are Known Worlds throughout the universe, all waiting to be discovered by a new generation. Worlds vary in size, difficulty, Creatures and the Resources you can discover.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_ACTION_SPEED_DESCRI: Don't be a slow coach, gain Busy Bee Boon and increase the Speed at which you can use Gear Forged with this Trait by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Action Speed ${LEVEL} Action Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_APPLY_SLOW_DESCRIPT: Slow your foes with Slowing Boon, the Trait that slows your targets with a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Slow,1)] Debuff when hit with shots from a Forged Slingbow.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_APPLY_WEAK_DESCRIPT: Weakness Boon, the Trait that Weakens your target's attacks with a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Weakening,1)] Debuff when hit with shots from a Forged Slingbow.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_AREA_OF_EFFECT_DESC: Think big with the Bomb-boosting Boon that increases Area of Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Area Of Effect ${LEVEL} Area Of Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CHANGE_BLOCK_TYPE_D: Transform a Chisel into a Changer with Transformation Boon. You'll no longer be able to chisel with it, but you may be able to change a Block's type when hitting with it.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CLEANSING_BOMB_DESC: Debuff your allies with Clean Slate Boon, the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into a Debuff eraser for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CRITICAL_CHANCE_DES: Beat the odds with the Boon that increases Critical Chance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Chance ${LEVEL} Critical Chance,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Forged Weapon or Tool.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_CRITICAL_EFFECT_DES: Hit 'em harder with the Boon that improves Critical Hit Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Effect ${LEVEL} Critical Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Weapon or Tool forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: The two-way Damage Increaser. Gives Gear Forged with this Trait a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Relative,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage increase as well as adding an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DAMAGE_OVER_TIME_DE: Leave a lasting impression with Let 'em Bleed Boon and cause a $[STYLE(Lvl ${LEVEL} Bleeding,1)] Debuff that continues to Damage your targets over time when hit with a Forged Slingbow shot.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DIFFICULTY_DESCRIPT: Master faster with Major Mastery Boon! The Trait that reduces Difficulty required when using Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Difficulty ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DROP_ATTRACTION_DES: Collect quicker with the Boon that makes Drops come to you. Automatically Harvest nearby defeated Creatures and attract Drops from $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Drop Attraction ${LEVEL} Drop Attraction Range,VAL,ABS)},1)] further away when holding Gear Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_DURABILITY_DESCRIPT: Heavy-duty Boon, for Gear that doesn't give in! Increases the Durability of Gear Forged with this Trait by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Durability ${LEVEL} Durability,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_EFFECT_ADJACENT_DES: Hit a Block with a Flanker's Force Boon Forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 1 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and those directly to the right and left of it.
Hit a Block with a Low Blow Boon forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 2 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and the one directly below it.

Hit a Block with a Tool forged with Cross Purposes Boon and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 3 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and those directly above, below and either side of it.

Hit a Block with an All-rounder Boon Forged Tool and cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Effect Adjacent 4 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage of a standard hit to that Block and all eight Blocks directly surrounding it.
Carry out a random act of Blockness with the Boon that causes full-powered Damage to both the Block you are hitting and a number of random Blocks surrounding it.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_GLOW_DESCRIPTION: Glow with the flow with Glow Boon. Allows Gear Forged with this Trait to emit a light with a radius of $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Glow ${LEVEL} Radius,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_HEALING_BOMB_DESCRI: Give your allies a good blast with Hot on Their Heals Boon, the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into restored Health for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_HEAVY_PROJECTILE_DE: Increases Projectile Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Heavy Projectile ${LEVEL} Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] whilst slowing Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Heavy Projectile ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Projectile trajectory arc is affected.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_HOOKSHOT_DESCRIPTIO: The Trait that transforms your standard Grapple into an all-action Hookshot. The grapple reels in automatically when attached, and Reel-In Speed is increased by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Hookshot 1 Reel In Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_KNOCKBACK_DESCRIPTI: Give your Bombs extra bang with Knockback Boon and increase Knockback distance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Knockback ${LEVEL} Knock Back,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_LENGTH_DESCRIPTION: Grapple further with Far Reaching Boon, the Trait that increases Forged Grapple Length by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Length ${LEVEL} Max Length,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_LIGHT_PROJECTILE_DE: Makes Projectiles fly lighter and faster with a flatter trajectory. Increases Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Light Projectile ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Slingbows Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_NUMBER_OF_SHOTS_DES: Get two shots for the price of one with Double Shot Boon. Slingbows Forged with this Trait fire $[STYLE(2,1)] shots rather than 1 inflicting $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 1 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Triple your efforts with Triple Shot Boon and fire $[STYLE(3,1)] shots rather than 1 when using a Forged Slingbow. Inflicts $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 2 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Why fire one shot when you can fire four? Causes Quadruple Shot Boon Forged Slingbows to fire $[STYLE(4,1)] shots with $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 3 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage per Projectile.

Five projectiles in one go! Quintuple Shot Boon causes Slingbows with the Trait to generate $[STYLE(5,1)] shots instead of 1, each inflicting $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 4 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage.

Be top of the shots with Sextuple Shot Boon. Causes Slingbows forged with this Trait to generate $[STYLE(6,1)] shots instead of 1, each inflicting $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Number Of Shots 5 Damage,VAL,ABS)},1)] of single shot Damage.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_PROJECTILE_SPEED_DE: It never hurts to be a little faster. Fly Fast Boon increases the Projectile Speed of Forge-enhanced Slingbows or Grapples by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Projectile Speed ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_RANGE_DESCRIPTION: Become a long-range sharpshooter with the Boon that increases Forged Slingbow Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Range ${LEVEL} Max Length,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_REEL_SPEED_DESCRIPT: Reel it in faster with the Boon that increases Grapple Reel In Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel In Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Also increases Reel Out Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel Out Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_REGENERATE_WORLD_DE: Talking 'bout Regeneration. Blast an area with Bombs Forged with this Trait and it'll force World Regeneration in that area. Has no effect within Beacons.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_STAMINA_BOMB_DESCRI: Give good Energy with the Trait that turns Forged Bomb Damage into restored Energy for nearby Citizens.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_STAMINA_USE_DESCRIP: Join the Energy saving initiative with Energy Saver Boon! The Gear Adjustment that reduces Energy lost with each use by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Stamina Use ${LEVEL} Burst Stamina Drain,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_BOON_WEAR_REMOVED_PER_HI: Repair Wear and tear with ease thanks to Wear Remover Boon the Trait that allows Forged Spanners to remonve an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL} Relative,VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts,1)] as well as removing an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL} Adder,VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts,1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_ACTION_SPEED_DESC: Slow progress is better than no progress with Slow Coach Defect, the Trait that reduces the Speed at which you can use Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Action Speed ${LEVEL} Action Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_AREA_OF_EFFECT_DE: Think small with the debilitating Defect that reduces Area of Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Area Of Effect ${LEVEL} Area Of Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Bombs Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_CRITICAL_CHANCE_D: Draw the unlucky card with the Defect that reduces Critical Hit Chance by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Critical Chance ${LEVEL} Critical Chance,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Forged Weapon or Tool.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_CRITICAL_EFFECT_D: Hit 'em softer with the debilitating Defect that reduces Critical Hit Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Critical Effect ${LEVEL} Critical Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using a Weapon or Tool forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTIO: The two-way Damage decreaser. Applies a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Relative,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage reduction as well as removing an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Damage ${LEVEL} Damage Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Damage to Gear Forged with this Trait.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DIFFICULTY_DESCRI: The Defect that makes a mockery of Mastery, increasing Difficulty level by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Difficulty ${LEVEL},VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Forged Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_DURABILITY_DESCRI: Fragile Gear Defect, the Trait that makes Gear less sturdy. Decreases the Durability of Forged Gear by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Durability ${LEVEL} Durability,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_KNOCKBACK_DESCRIP: Knockback Defect, the adverse Trait that knocks down Knockbacks by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Knockback ${LEVEL} Knock Back,VAL,ABS)},1)] when using Forged Bombs.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_LENGTH_DESCRIPTIO: It's not the length of the Grapple but how you use it! Grapple Length Defect decreases Forged Grapple Reach by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Length ${LEVEL} Max Length,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_PROJECTILE_SPEED_: Gets your Projectiles on the go-slow by decreasing the Projectile Speed of Forge-enhanced Slingbows or Grapples by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Projectile Speed ${LEVEL} Projectile Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_RANGE_DESCRIPTION: The Defect that gets you closer to the action by reducing Forged Slingbow Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Range ${LEVEL} Max Length,VAL,ABS)},1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_REEL_SPEED_DESCRI: Slow down Reel time with the Defect that decreases Reel Out Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel Out Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] and Reel In Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reel Speed ${LEVEL} Reel In Speed,VAL,ABS)},1)] for Forged Grapples.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_STAMINA_USE_DESCR: An Energy expending Defect that increases the amount of Energy lost by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Stamina Use ${LEVEL} Burst Stamina Drain,VAL,ABS)},1)] each time Gear Forged with this Trait is used.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_DEFECT_WEAR_REMOVED_PER_: More Wear, less Repair with Wear Remover Defect, the Trait that takes away $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL} Relative,VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts,1)] as well as taking away an extra $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Wear Removed Per Hit ${LEVEL} Adder,VAL,ABS)} Wear Pts,1)].
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_ITEM_QUIRK_FIRE_RANDOMLY: Watch where you're pointing that thing! Forged Gear with this Quirk fires or hits at random when equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_ITEM_QUIRK_MAKES_ODD_SOU: The Quirk that makes Forged Gear sound quirky whenever it's used!
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_BOUNCY_FEET_DESCRI: Let gravity go with Bouncy Feet Quirk. Every surface will feel like a Trampoline when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_CREATURE_AGGRO_RAN: Aggravate the opposition with the Quirk that makes Creatures more likely to attack you when you're holding the Forged Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_DRAINS_HEALTH_DESC: Pack your Inventory with Healing Brews! Using Forged Gear with Bleeding Edge Quirk constantly drains your Health whilst equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_DRAINS_HUNGER_DESC: Keep plenty of Food to hand when using Forged Gear with this Quirk. It will make you hungrier and hungrier whilst equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_JUMP_RANDOMLY_DESC: They say Look Before You Leap, but you won't have chance with the Quirk that makes you jump at random when holding the Forged Gear.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_DAY_TIME_DESC: The Quirk for those who seize the day! Causes the Forged Traits of Gear to work only in daylight.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_HIGH_HEALTH_D: For those in the Best of Health. Forged Traits for Gear with this Quirk only apply during times of High Health.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_HIGH_HUNGER_D: When your Citizen's belly is Full Up, the Forged Traits of Gear with this Quirk will apply.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_LOW_HEALTH_DE: How low can you go? Forged Traits for Gear with this Quirk only apply during times of Low Health.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_LOW_HUNGER_DE: Citizen feeling ravenous? They'll need to, for the Forged Traits of Gear with this Quirk to work.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_ONLY_NIGHT_TIME_DE: The Quirk for night owls everywhere, causing the Forged Traits of Gear to apply only when darkness falls.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SINK_IN_WATER_DESC: Get that sinking feeling with the Forged Gear Quirk that makes you sink in water. Only applies when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SLIPPERY_FEET_DESC: Let it slide with the Quirk that makes every Block seem like Ice when Forged Gear is equipped.
GUI_TRAIT_FORGE_QUIRK_SLOWS_YOU_DOWN_DES: Make like a Tortoise and take it slowly with Slow-Mo Quirk. You'll always move and act slower when Forged Gear with this Quirk is equipped.
GUI_WARP_BUMP_BUTTON:
BUMP WARP
(Moves Warp to safe location)
GUI_WARP_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to spend ${XXX} Coin opening this Warp? You currently have ${YYY} Coin and may not be able to Warp back.
INFO_BEACON_LOW_EXPIRED_SUBTITLE: One of your Beacons has expired
INFO_BEACON_LOW_FUEL_SUBTITLE: One of your Beacon's is low on Fuel
INFO_CONSOLE_NOT_PERMITTED: Beacon Control cannot be placed here
INFO_CREATE_INVENTORY_SPACE_SUBTITLE: Create space in the Inventory for the Trading Items
INFO_DEATH_PENALTY_APPLIED_SUBTITLE: ${VALUE1}% XP Penalty for the next ${VALUE2} XP earned
INFO_HAS_CONSOLE: Plots containing a Beacon Control cannot be removed
INFO_INVALID_BLOCK_PLACEMENT_OUTSIDE_BEA: This Block can only be placed within a Beacon
INFO_INVALID_BLOCK_POSITION_SUBTITLE: There is a Creature or Citizen in the way
INFO_INVALID_ENGINE_POSITION_SUBTITLE: Invalid position for an Power Coil
INFO_INVALID_INTERACTION_SUBTITLE: You do not have Permissions within this Beacon

ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_COMPONENT_SE: An unusual and ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_DEVICE_SEAM_: A rare ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_FRAGMENT_SEA: An unusual and ancient Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_ASH_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A soft, dark grey Block, which can hinder Movement Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED1_DESC: The Weapon Augment that helps you deploy Bombs more speedily. Add it to a Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase your Bomb Action Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED2_DESC: Deploy Bombs even quicker with this powerful temporary Augment. Increases Bomb Action Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_ACTIONSPEED3_DESC: An ultra rare and ultra effective Bomb Augment. Use it to substantially increase the Speed at which you can deploy the Augmented Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Temporary.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT1_DES: Give your Bombs a bigger boom with an Area of Effect Augment. Increase the size of area affected by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] on detonation.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT2_DES: Get a bigger bang from your Bombs over a wider area with this extra explosive Augment. Add to any Bag of Bombs to increase the Area of Effect of those Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_AREAOFEFFECT3_DES: Give your Bombs the biggest bang around with this ultra rare and mighty Augment. Increases the Area of Effect of Augmented Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT1_D: The Bomb Augment that gets Critical results. Add to any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT2_D: The even better Bomb Augment for more critical Criticals. Use with any Bag of Bombs to increase Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_CRITICALEFFECT3_D: An extremely rare and powerful Bomb Augment of which the Oortarch would be proud. Significantly increases Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE1_DESCRIPTI: A useful addition to any Bag of Bombs. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE2_DESCRIPTI: A craftable rare Weapon Augment that increases Bomb Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_DAMAGE3_DESCRIPTI: The rarest and most powerful Damage Bomb Augment available. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED1_: Pep up your Bombs' Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] with the Augment designed to make your Bombs reach their target quicker. All Augments are temporary.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED2_: Get your Bombs there faster! Use the rare Augment that increases Bomb travelling Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] temporarily.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_BOMB_PROJECTILESPEED3_: The rarest, yet speediest option for increasing your Bombs' Projectile Speed. Use with any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase the speed at which Bombs will reach their target by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED1_: Fire faster than your average Citizen with the Slingbow Augment that increases Fire Rate. Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED2_: Be an even speedier Shot with the Augment that noticeably increases Slingbow Fire Rate. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_ACTIONSPEED3_: Fire faster than you can think with the Slingbow Augment that significantly increases Fire Rate. The Augment is destroyed once charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_CRITICALEFFEC: Fire with confidence thanks to the Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Critical Effect. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
Fire with even more confidence! This Augment noticeably boosts Critical Effect when combined with a Slingbow. The Augment temporary.
Full force Slingbow firing with the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Critical Effect. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE1_DESCR: Combine with a Slingbow to cause a little Extra Damage with each Bolt fired. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE2_DESCR: Boosts your Bolt Damage a little more when attached to a Slingbow. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_DAMAGE3_DESCR: Do even more Damage with Bolts when an Augment of this type is attached to a Slingbow. The Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH1_DE: Fire further using the basic Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Weapon Range. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH2_DE: Make your Slingbows longer-range with the Augment that noticeably increases Weapon Range. Augments are temporary and are destroyed once charge is lost.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_MAXLENGTH3_DE: Fire from afar with the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Slingbow Firing Range. Augments are temporary.
ITEM_TYPE_AUGMENT_SLINGBOW_PROJECTILESPE: Get your Slingbow Bolts to their Targets faster with a basic Projectile Augment. The Augment is destroyed once charge is lost.
The Augment that puts more power behind your Slingbow Bolts making them fly even faster. Augments are temporary and will be destroyed once charge is lost.
Give your Slingbow Bolts even more momentum with this ultra rare and ultra powerful Augment that significantly increases projectile velocity. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_AGGRAVATING_MEGA_DESCRIPT: A fragrant Brew which temporarily increases your Threat Rating during combat. Helps to draw Creature attacks away from other Citizens.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CALMING_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: A Mega Brew which temporarily reduces your Threat Rating during combat for a calmer Combat experience.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_GREATER_DESCRIP: Detox with a Greater Cleansing Brew and instantly remove or significantly reduce the duration of Debuffs.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_IMPROVED_DESCRI: Eliminate minor Debuffs and reduce the duration of major Debuffs with this Improved Cleansing Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_MEGA_DESCRIPTIO: Destroy those Debuffs with a Mega Cleansing Brew; the Mega Brew that instantly removes or substantially reduces the duration of Debuffs.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_MINOR_DESCRIPTI: A deep blue Brew which instantly reduces the duration of any Debuffs affecting its drinker.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_CLEANSING_SUPER_DESCRIPTI: The deep blue Super Brew that gives its drinker a Super Debuff Cleanse.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_GREATER_DESCRIPTION: A sweet and sour Brew which accelerates its drinker's actions.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_IMPROVED_DESCRIPTION: Run faster, act faster with Improved Fast Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Gives the consumer a Mega boost of Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_MINOR_DESCRIPTION: Put some pep in your step with the Brew that temporarily makes you run and act faster than before.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_FAST_SUPER_DESCRIPTION: Make yourself super speedy with the odd tasting Brew that temporarily increases Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_GREATER_DESCRIPTI: Still bland but even more potent. Restores a greater portion of Health over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_GREATER_INSTANT_D: The Instant Healing Brew that's even Greater.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_IMPROVED_DESCRIPT: A bland but powerful Brew that partially Heals its drinker over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_IMPROVED_INSTANT_: Perk up a little more with Improved Instant Healing Brew for an instant Health boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Be full of vim and vigour with the most potent of slow Healing Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MEGA_INSTANT_DESC: Feel fully refreshed with the most potent of Instant Healing Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MINOR_DESCRIPTION: A minor Brew which restores a minor portion of Health over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_MINOR_INSTANT_DES: Perk up with an Instant Healing Brew. Restores a small portion of Health, ideal for use after minor skirmishes or low falls.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_SUPER_DESCRIPTION: What it lacks in taste, it makes up for in effects! Promotes super Healing for a short period when consumed.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_HEALING_SUPER_INSTANT_DES: Get back to good Health with a single super hit of Instant Health.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_GREATER_DESCRIP: Drink Greater Innocuous Brew for calmer Creature encounters. Further reduces the range at which Creatures will attack the drinker. A temporary solution.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_MEGA_DESCRIPTIO: The pleasantly pink Brew which temporarily allows its drinker to pass peacefully by Creatures at closer range.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_INNOCUOUS_MINOR_DESCRIPTI: Get closer to Creatures with the Brew that makes you seem less threatening. Temporarily reduces the range at which Creatures will attack the drinker.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_GREATER_DESCRIPT: Get an even greater glow with the Brew that gives you a brighter burst of luminosity.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Shine on with a temporary burst of Mega Luminosity.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_LUMINOUS_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: Get that glowing feeling with a Luminous Brew. The vibrant Brew that temporarily allows its drinker to emit light from their body.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_GREATER_DESCRIPT: The great golden Brew that allows its drinker to slowly recover more Energy over a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_GREATER_INSTANT_: Energy getting low? Grab a Greater Instant Recovery Brew for a more potent Instant Energy Boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_IMPROVED_DESCRIP: The golden Brew that's even better for slow Energy Recovery.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_IMPROVED_INSTANT: Guaranteed to give its consumer an improved instant Energy boost.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Feel mega with a Brew that gives its drinker unrivalled slow Energy recovery over a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MEGA_INSTANT_DES: When you've little Energy left to burn, drink Mega Instant Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: The answer to consistent minor Energy loss. Recovers a small portion of Energy over time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_MINOR_INSTANT_DE: When your Energy starts to ebb, glug Minor Instant Recovery Brew to instantly recover a small portion of Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_SUPER_DESCRIPTIO: Supercharge your slow Energy recovery with Super Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_RECOVERY_SUPER_INSTANT_DE: Give your Energy a super boost with Super Instant Recovery Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_REVIVAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Feeling Defeated? Drink a potent Reviver Brew to return to a waking state.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STICKY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An icky, sticky Brew to keep your feet in place on icy terrain.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_GREATER_DESCRIPT: When the going gets tough, the tough drink Greater Strength Brew.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_IMPROVED_DESCRIP: Vivid purple and designed to deliver a little more Strength to its drinker. Increases Damage dealt per hit, temporarily.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_MEGA_DESCRIPTION: Be a real hard hitter with this rare purple Brew that substantially increases the amount of Damage you can deal, for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_MINOR_DESCRIPTIO: Get tough with Minor Strength Brew! Temporarily increases the amount of Damage you deal per hit.
ITEM_TYPE_BREW_STRENGTH_SUPER_DESCRIPTIO: Do even more Damage with the Super Brew that allows its drinker to deal significantly more Damage for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A Bucket of Wildstock Milk, but there's no need for milking! Use to make Food Recipe Ingredients and Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_FORTIFIED_DESCRIPT: For when you need milk that's a little extra.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_MILK_PURIFIED_DESCRIPTI: A Bucket of Wildstock Milk, purified.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_WATER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A refreshing Bucket of Water. Quite ordinary.
ITEM_TYPE_BUCKET_WATER_PURIFIED_DESCRIPT: A Bucket of the purest Water. Use it when standard water just won't do.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_DEFAULT_COMPACT_DESCRIPTI: A compressed Block of Coal. Lasts longer as a Fuel in this state.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_DEFAULT_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A good Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_HARD_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A solid Block of Hard Coal. A longer burning Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_HARD_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: An excellent Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_SOFT_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A compacted Block of Soft Coal. A better Fuel than before.
ITEM_TYPE_COAL_SOFT_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decent Fuel source embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_BASE_DESCRIP: A useful Block made with sturdy Stone. Stores up to 4 Items, combine Storage Blocks to store even more.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_SHELF_DESCRI: Store or display Items with a wooden Shelf. Stores up to 4 Items. Combine Shelves for more Storage space.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTROL_BEACON_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A sturdy Beacon for claiming Land. Items and Furnishings placed inside a Beacon will be safe from other Citizens and World Regeneration. Requires Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTROL_CAMPFIRE_BASE_DESCRIPT: A simple Beacon for claiming Land. Protects Items and Furnishings placed within its reach from other Citizens and World Regeneration, until the Campfire burns out. Non-refuelable.
ITEM_TYPE_CORRUPTION_ANCIENT_BASE_DESCRI: A highly hazardous Block with fatal attributes.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A gleaming Crystal Block used mostly for Crafting decorative fixtures.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_LANTERN_DESCRIPT: A decorative lantern, which emits a bluish light.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_REFINED_DESCRIPT: A bright, refined Crystal Block. Used for Decoration.
ITEM_TYPE_DARKGLASS_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIP: A transparent Block of darkened Glass. Less easy to see through.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_ORNATE_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A softly glowing Door with a beautiful Known World style. The perfect finish for even the most luxurious of Builds.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_ORNATE_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A nice Door for opening and closing. Quite ornate. Can be used with Locks to secure access to your Builds.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_ORNATE_STONE_DESCRIPTION: An ornately decorated Stone Door with a very Oortian feel. Can be secured using Locks.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_ORNATE_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A lovely Ornate Door Crafted with Wood. Prevents Creatures wandering into your Build with the right configuration of walls.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_PLAIN_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decoratively simple Door crafted using Gleam. Emits a constant soft glow.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_PLAIN_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A plain metal Door for the minimalist decorator. Can be secured with a Lock.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_PLAIN_STONE_DESCRIPTION: Close the Door on roaming Creatures with a simple Stone Door. Works well with walls!
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_PLAIN_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A simple Wooden Door for opening, closing and looking nice-ish. Place a Lock next to it to prevent unwanted guests!
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_STYLISH_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decorative Door that will glow gently all night or day. Remember to add a Lock if you want make a Door secure!
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_STYLISH_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A Metal Door with a little decorative flair. It won't keep out much without a Lock.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_STYLISH_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A Stylish Stone Door Piece. Place 2 or more pieces together to reveal a pattern. Ornamental.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_STYLISH_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A Wooden Door with a little more style. Can be both decorative and practical.
ITEM_TYPE_ESSENCE_VITAL_ANCIENT_DESCRIPT: An ancient Essence from ancient Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_ESSENCE_VITAL_FRESH_DESCRIPTIO: The extracted Essence of Organic materials.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_LATTICE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A traditional lattice Fence Piece, for making Fences.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_ORNATE_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: An intricate Fence made out of Gleam.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_ORNATE_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A Metal Fence piece of ornate design.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_ORNATE_STONE_DESCRIPTION: An ornate bit of Stone Fence. Decorative.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_ORNATE_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A Wooden Fence piece with ornate detail.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_PLAIN_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A plain Fence piece with a little bit of glow.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_PLAIN_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A Metal Fence piece. Makes a simple Fence when placed with other Fence Pieces.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_PLAIN_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A simple Stone Fence. A nice bit of decoration.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_PLAIN_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A plain Wood fence, for fencing things.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_RINGSTONE_BASE_DESCRIPTI: An unusual Fence Piece, very nice to look at.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_SPIT_CUTTLETRUNK_DESCRIP: A decorative line of tiny Cuttletrunks, that make quite a nice Fence.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_SPIT_HOPPER_DESCRIPTION: A decorative homage to the Hopper.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_SPIT_WILDSTOCK_DESCRIPTI: A decorative homage to the Wildstock that roam the Known Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_STYLISH_GLEAM_DESCRIPTIO: A nice bit of Gleam Fence. Used for decoration.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_STYLISH_STONE_DESCRIPTIO: A stylish bit of Stone Fence.
ITEM_TYPE_FENCE_STYLISH_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A more stylish Fence piece for making stylish Wooden Fences.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_FLOWER_1_DESCRIPTION: A small flower cluster that looks pretty when planted.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_FLOWER_2_DESCRIPTION: A slightly alien looking plant used for decorative purposes.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_FLOWER_3_DESCRIPTION: A tall decorative plant reminiscent of Earth's Foxglove. Can be unusually coloured.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_FLOWER_4_DESCRIPTION: A gnarled and unusual plant used for gardens and decoration.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_PLANT_FIBROUS_DESCRIPTIO: An unusual Plant with a little resemblance to a Trumpet. Known to drop useful Food Recipe Items.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_PLANT_FIBROUS_DUGUP_DESC: An unusual Plant with a little resemblance to a Trumpet. Known to drop useful Food Recipe Items.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_PLANT_INKY_DESCRIPTION: Almost looks like a comfy seat. Often contains useful Resources.
ITEM_TYPE_FLORA_PLANT_INKY_DUGUP_DESCRIP: Almost looks like a comfy seat. Often contains useful Resources.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_CASSEROLE_DES: A critically chunky Casserole which temporarily increases Critical Chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_LOAF_COOKED_D: Fast food for when you need a Critical edge.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_LOAF_RAW_DESC: A soggy, uncooked bread dough filled made from an old Oortian Recipe.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_PIE_COOKED_DE: The best Criticaling foodstuff around. Eaten long ago by Oortians.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_PIE_RAW_DESCR: Decidedly soggy and not particularly good for those who eat it. Try cooking for better results.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_RISOTTO_COOKE: Keep your Citizen lean and keen with a Criticaling Risotto, the Rice dish that temporarily increases Critical Hit chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_RISOTTO_RAW_D: A cold, raw Risotto which would benefit from some time spent cooking.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_CRITICALING_SOUP_DESCRIPT: A super Soup that temporarily increases your chance of Critical Hits.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_BASE_COOKED_DESC: The Known World alternative to baked potato. Packed with flavour and Max Energy Restoring properties.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_BASE_RAW_DESCRIP: An odd looking root vegetable. Restores a small portion of Max Energy when eaten, more potent when cooked. May cause Sickness if eaten raw.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_EXOTIC_COOKED_DE: A delicacy of the Known Worlds, both tasty and remarkably restorative.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_EXOTIC_RAW_DESCR: An exotic purple-hued root vegetable eaten to restore a portion of Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_LOAF_COOKED_DESC: Banish hunger and replenish Energy with this satisfyingly crusty Loaf.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_LOAF_RAW_DESCRIP: An unpleasantly doughy Raw Earthyam bread. Helps to recover some Max Energy with a side effect of Sickness. Use your loaf, bake it to make it more palatable and potent.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_PIE_COOKED_DESCR: A tasty piece of Pie filled with flavoursome Earthyam.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_PIE_RAW_DESCRIPT: A soggy, uncooked Pie filled with orange Earthyam. Mouth-wateringly tasty when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_RISOTTO_COOKED_D: A creamy, baked Earthyam Risotto. Gives a good hit of both basic and Max Energy to the consumer.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_RISOTTO_RAW_DESC: A bowl of raw Earthyam Risotto, a little hard to digest. May cause Sickness.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_SOUP_DESCRIPTION: Curb your Hunger with this gold-hued Max Energy restoring Soup. Will also restore some basic Energy when depleted.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_STEW_DESCRIPTION: A chunky Stew with the wholesome goodness of Earthyam. Eat to restore a little basic and Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_WAXY_COOKED_DESC: A delicious baked root vegetable with a crisp, waxy skin. Restores a good portion of Max Energy when consumed.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_EARTHYAM_WAXY_RAW_DESCRIP: A tough, waxy root vegetable known for its ability to restore Max Energy when consumed. Eating raw may cause Sickness.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_LOAF_COOKED_DE: The crusty bread that energises! Gives its consumer a boost of extra Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_LOAF_RAW_DESCR: A raw bread dough that energises when cooked. Eating raw causes Sickness.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_PIE_COOKED_DES: Packed with Energising nutrients. Significantly increases its consumers Max Energy, albeit temporarily.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_PIE_RAW_DESCRI: A raw Pie that becomes beneficial when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_RISOTTO_COOKED: A perfectly cooked Risotto. A Known World speciality, famed for its ability to temporarily give its eater extra Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_RISOTTO_RAW_DE: A tough and gritty raw Risotto. Tastier and more beneficial when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_SOUP_DESCRIPTI: A deliciously Energising Soup. Consume it for a temporary increase in Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_ENERGISING_STEW_DESCRIPTI: Feel satisfied with the Stew that gives a little extra Max Energy! Packed with nutrient-dense Ingredients.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_BREAD_COOKED_DES: The Loaf doesn't float but its eater will feel like they do! Temporarily makes you Jump higher and Fall with less Damage.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_BROTH_DESCRIPTIO: A delicately sweet Broth. Consumers report a temporary feeling of lightness when Jumping or Falling.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_PIE_COOKED_DESCR: A premium Pie that lightens your load. Temporarily Jump big and reduce Falling Damage every time you eat it.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_PIE_RAW_DESCRIPT: Ultra Rare, but also ultra raw. Try cooking for best results.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_PORRIDGE_COOKED_: The deliciously cooked Oats that make you Float. Feel lighter, Jump higher and land softer during Falls.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_PORRIDGE_RAW_DES: An odd-textured Porridge, maybe cooking would make it more edible?
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_FLOATING_STEW_DESCRIPTION: A sweet, sticky bowl Stew. Great to eat when you need a little more bounce in your step.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_BREAD_COOKED: An extra-sweet, crusty Loaf which gives its consumer a temporary Max Health boost.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_BREAD_RAW_DE: A bitter, green dough which would benefit highly from cooking.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_PIE_COOKED_D: A delightfully crisp and Invigorating Pie. Gives a significant Max Health boost for a short period.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_PIE_RAW_DESC: A raw filled Pie which could be quite Invigorating if cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_PORRIDGE_COO: Feel invigorated with this gloriously green Health boosting Porridge.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_PORRIDGE_RAW: An uncooked Oaty mix. Would benefit from heating.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_SOUP_DESCRIP: Get souped up, with an oddly sweet Soup known for its ability to temporarily increase Maximum Health.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_INVIGORATING_STEW_DESCRIP: An extra-sweet and sticky bowl of Stew. Gives the consumer a temporary Health boost.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEATLOAF_COOKED_DESCRIPTI: A rustic Meat Loaf. A homely meal which replenishes some Energy and Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEATLOAF_RAW_DESCRIPTION: An uncooked Meat Loaf. Somewhat squishy and unappetising.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEATY_BROTH_DESCRIPTION: A satisfying cooked Meaty Broth. Replenishes some basic and Max Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEATY_CASSEROLE_DESCRIPTI: A succulent and rich Meaty Casserole packed with Energy restoring nutrients.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEATY_RISOTTO_COOKED_DESC: A mouth-watering Risotto cooked in a Furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_BASE_COOKED_DESCRIPT: A chewy piece of cooked Creature Meat. Consuming it restores a good portion of Health.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_BASE_RAW_DESCRIPTION: A chunk of raw Creature Meat. Best cooked before eating.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_LEAN_COOKED_DESCRIPT: Stay lean and mean with Lean Meat. A great Max Energy refuel Food which is both succulent and tender.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_LEAN_RAW_DESCRIPTION: Raw Meat but leaner. Eating it raw make you Sick.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_PIE_COOKED_DESCRIPTI: A tasty pastry filled with tender Meat.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_PIE_RAW_DESCRIPTION: An unbaked Pie containing Raw Meat, best served cooked. Eating may cause Sickness.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_PRIME_COOKED_DESCRIP: The mighty meaty way to replenish your Max Energy. The best of the best, succulent, juicy and full of oomph.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_MEAT_PRIME_RAW_DESCRIPTIO: A prime cut of Creature Meat. Hard to digest when raw.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PERSISTING_LOAF_COOKED_DE: A sumptuous, soft Loaf that gives you the power to Persist! Temporarily allows its eater to lose less Durability when using Gear.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PERSISTING_LOAF_RAW_DESCR: An oddly crunchy, uncooked purple bread dough. Soft, flavoursome and nutritious when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PERSISTING_PIE_COOKED_DES: The punchy, purple Pie that helps keep your Gear in tip-top shape for longer.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PERSISTING_PIE_RAW_DESCRI: A decidedly soggy uncooked Pie. Packed with Persisting possibilities. Cook for best results.
