ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PERSISTING_RISOTTO_RAW_DE: An unappetizing, pale purple Risotto, far too raw to be good for you.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_BIRYANI_CAUSTI: An odd-tasting dish which temporarily protects against Damage from Corrosion and Toxin Atmospheres when eaten.

A raw and unappetising Biryani which does little for its eater. Cook to release both flavour and positive benefits.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_BIRYANI_VOLATI: A super spicy Rice dish that takes the heat out of both Blast and Burn Damage for a short period of time.
Would be a particularly protective Biryani, if cooked.

Raw and not very good to eat in this state. Causes Sickness.

A spicy uncooked Chilli with the potential to be particularly potent when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_CHILLI_VOLATIL: A not too Volatile Chilli. Eating it temporarily gives its consumer a little protection against Blast and Burn Damage.
Spicy, uncooked and a little too crunchy. Eat sparingly when raw.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_PIE_CAUSTIC_CO: An extra spicy delicacy of Oortian descent. Known for its ability to give it's eater a high-level protection against Corrosion and Toxin Atmosphere Damage for a short period.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_PIE_CAUSTIC_RA: An uncooked pastry case stuffed with a raw spicy filling. Has the potential to be both delicious and beneficial if cooked.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_PIE_VOLATILE_C: A protective Pie which helps those who eat it to guard against Damage from Blast and Burn Atmospheres for a short period of time.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_PROTECTING_PIE_VOLATILE_R: A soggy raw Pie. Nice and spicy but inadvisable to eat often in this state.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_BROTH_BLAST_DES: It is reported that consumers of this Broth gain the temporary ability to Shield against a small amount of Blast Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_BROTH_BURN_DESC: Don't burn, baby burn with this odd tasting Broth.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_BROTH_CHILL_DES: An uncomplicated Broth that gives its consumer a temporary low-level ability to Shield against Chill-type Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_BROTH_CORROSION: An old Oortian Recipe which allows its consumer to temporarily Shield against a low level of Corrosion Damage

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_BROTH_SHOCK_DES: An uncomplicated Broth which has a slight Shielding effect against Shock-type Damage.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_BLAST: A nutritious Casserole eaten for its temporary Blast Shield giving properties.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_BURN_: A rustic Casserole with an unusual taste that's well worth eating for its Burn Shielding qualities.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_CORRO: A warming Casserole that's eaten throughout the Known Worlds. Gives its consumer Corrosion Shielding benefits for a short time.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_DESCR: A chunky Casserole known for its protective qualities.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_SHOCK: A homely Casserole. Known to give its consumer temporary protection against Shock Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_CASSEROLE_TOXIN: An unusually chunky Casserole. Eaters report a temporary decrease in Toxin Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_BLAST_COOK: A delicious crusty Loaf guaranteed to temporarily help its eater reduce Blast Damage taken.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_BLAST_RAW_: A soft, raw dough with the potential to be a deliciously protective Loaf. Cook for better benefits.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_SHOCK_COOK: Shield against Shock Damage with this hearty Loaf. Provides a good level of temporary protection and staves off Hunger.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_SHOCK_RAW_: A not-so-delicious, uncooked bread dough. A bit of a shock to the system when eaten raw.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_TOXIN_COOK: A deliciously crusty Loaf which temporarily gives its consumer a good level of Toxin Shielding.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_LOAF_TOXIN_RAW_: Raw bread dough which causes Sickness if eaten uncooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_BLAST_COOKE: A potent Pie that temporarily beats Blast Damage.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_BURN_COOKED: A powerful Pie with an odd but not unpleasant aftertaste. Gives its consumer a significant temporary Shield against Burn-type Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_BURN_RAW_DE: A soggy uncooked pastry filled. May cause Sickness. Cooking before eating is recommended.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_CHILL_COOKE: A deliciously golden Pie which provides a temporary high-level Shield against Chill Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_CHILL_RAW_D: A pale, soggy Pie in much need of cooking. Causes Sickness when eaten raw. Has protective qualities when cooked.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_COOKED_DESC: A mouthwateringly protective Pie. Significantly increases Physical Damage Shielding for a short period.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_CORROSION_C: An ultra rare Pie, tastes surprisingly Shieldy.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_CORROSION_R: An extremely rare Pie which would offer Corrosion Shielding to it's consumer, were it cooked.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_SHOCK_COOKE: Eat Shock Shielding Pie for the best temporary Shock Shielding around.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_PIE_SHOCK_RAW_D: A raw, slimy Pie. Made with very rare Ingredients. Beneficial when cooked.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_RISOTTO_BURN_CO: Don't burn up, eat Burn Shielding Risotto to temporarily reduce Burn Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_RISOTTO_BURN_RA: A raw Risotto that does little but make you Sick. Best eaten cooked.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_RISOTTO_CORROSI: A well-cooked Risotto with an unusually purple taste! Known to give those who eat it a temporary Shield against some Corrosion-type Damage.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_RISOTTO_RAW_DES: An unappetising raw Risotto. Reinstates a small amount of Max Energy but causes temporary Sickness.
ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_SHIELDING_RISOTTO_SHOCK_C: A delectable Rice-based dish packed with a hit of temporary Shock Shielding power.

ITEM_TYPE_FOOD_TEACHING_BREAD_RAW_DESCRI: A gooey, raw bread dough that could do with being less raw.

ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_BASE_COMPOUND_DESCRIPTIO: A simple Recipe Base first used by Crafters of Oortian descent.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_BASE_GUM_DESCRIPTION: A somewhat gummy Recipe Base. Makes Gums gummy.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_BASE_PASTE_DESCRIPTION: You can't make a Paste without Paste Base.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_BASE_RESIN_DESCRIPTION: If you need to make a Resin, you'll need a Resin Base.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_BASE_SOLVENT_DESCRIPTION: A particularly Viscous type of Base.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_BOOST_BOON_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which replaces a $[STYLE(Fate,2)] Buff with a $[STYLE(Boon Boost,2)] Buff with the same duration.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_POINTS_BOON1_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes a $[STYLE(Fate,2)] Buff, and for each round worth of duration left adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Points Catalyst 1 Boon Points Adder From Fate Effects,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_POINTS_BOON2_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes a $[STYLE(Fate,2)] Buff, and for each round worth of duration left adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Points Catalyst 2 Boon Points Adder From Fate Effects,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_REVERSAL_DEFECT: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reversal Catalyst Boon Points Adder From Defect Points,VAL,ABS)},1)] of the current Defect Points and adds the same number of Boon Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_VIGOUR1_DESCRIP: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes all Buffs and Debuffs, and for each round worth of duration left adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Vigour Catalyst 1 Vigour Adder From Status Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] Vigour.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_CATALYST_VIGOUR2_DESCRIP: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes all Buffs and Debuffs, and for each round worth of duration left adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Vigour Catalyst 2 Vigour Adder From Status Effect,VAL,ABS)},1)] Vigour.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_CORRUPTED1: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corrupted Boon Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness and subsequently applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 1 Corruption,2)] Debuff which adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corruption Debuff 1,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points per round for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corrupted Boon Compound 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},2)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_CORRUPTED2: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corrupted Boon Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness and subsequently applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 2 Corruption,2)] Debuff which adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corruption Debuff 2,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points per round for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Corrupted Boon Compound 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},2)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_DRAINING1_: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Draining Boon Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness and subsequently applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 1 Vigour Drain,2)] Debuff which drains $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Drain Debuff 1,VAL,ABS)},2)] Vigour per round for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Draining Boon Compound 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},2)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_DRAINING2_: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Draining Boon Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness and subsequently applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 2 Vigour Drain,2)] Debuff which drains $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Drain Debuff 2,VAL,ABS)},2)] Vigour per round for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Draining Boon Compound 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},2)] rounds.

ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_IMPERFECT2: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Boon Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness, but also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Boon Compound 1 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points.

ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_PURE2_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Pure Boon Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_PURE3_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Pure Boon Compound 3 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_UNSTABLE1_: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness, but also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 1 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 1 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_UNSTABLE2_: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness, but also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 2 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 2 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_BOON_UNSTABLE3_: A Centraforge Ingredient which adds up to $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 3 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Boon Points depending on Effectiveness, but also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 3 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Boon Compound 3 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_REDUCTION_DEFEC: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reduction Compound 1 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Defect Points and subsequently removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reduction Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reduction Compound 2 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Defect Points and also subsequently removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Reduction Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 1 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Defect Points, also removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 1 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Quirk Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 2 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Defect Points, but also removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Unstable Defect Reduction Compound 2 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_COMPOUND_REDUCTION_QUIRK: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Reduction Compound 1 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Quirk Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Reduction Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Reduction Compound 2 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Quirk Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Reduction Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 1 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Quirk Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 1 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points. Also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 1 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points.

A Centraforge Ingredient which removes $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 2 Round Quirk Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},1)] Quirk Points and $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 2 Round Boon Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Boon Points. Also adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Imperfect Quirk Reduction Compound 2 Round Defect Points Adder,VAL,ABS)},2)] Defect Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_EASE_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies an $[STYLE(Ease,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Ease Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_EFFECT_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies an $[STYLE(Effect,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Effect Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_EXPANSION_TRAIT_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Trait Expansion,1)] Buff subsequently making it more likely that Points will go into newly added Boons, Defects and Quirks rather than levelling up existing ones. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_GLOW_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Glow,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Glow Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_LIGHTNESS_DESCRIPTIO: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lightness,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Lightness Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_LONGEVITY_DESCRIPTIO: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Longevity,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Longevity Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_REDUCTION_TRAIT_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Trait Reduction,1)] Buff subsequently making it more likely that Points will go into levelling up existing Boons, Defects and Quirks rather than adding new ones. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_GUM_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Special,1)] Buff that subsequently increases the chance of Special Boons being selected. The Buff lasts indefinitely, and can be stacked to further increase the chance.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_BOOST_BOON1_DESCRI: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Boon Boost,1)] Buff that subsequently increases Boon Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Boost Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Boost Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_BOOST_BOON2_DESCRI: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Boon Boost,1)] Buff that subsequently increases Boon Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Boost Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Boost Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_ENVIGORATION1_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 1 Invigoration,1)] Buff that subsequently adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Buff 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] Vigour for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_ENVIGORATION2_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 2 Invigoration,1)] Buff that subsequently adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Buff 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] Vigour for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Envigoration Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_FATE1_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Fate,1)] Buff that subsequently improves the chance of all Point Sliders landing favourably for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Fate Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_FATE2_DESCRIPTION: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Fate,1)] Buff that subsequently improves the chance of all Point Sliders landing favourably for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Fate Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GAMBLING1_DESCRIPT: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 1 Gambling,1)] Buff for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gambling Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds. While this Buff is active there is a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gamble Buff 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] chance of avoiding Stability reductions.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GAMBLING2_DESCRIPT: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 2 Gambling,1)] Buff for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gambling Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds. While this Buff is active there is a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Gamble Buff 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] chance of avoiding Stability reductions.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GUARD_DEFECT1_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Defect Guard,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Defect Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Guard Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GUARD_DEFECT2_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Defect Guard,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Defect Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Guard Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GUARD_QUIRK1_DESCR: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Quirk Guard,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Quirk Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Guard Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_GUARD_QUIRK2_DESCR: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Quirk Guard,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Quirk Point gain by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Guard Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Guard Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_PROTECTION1_DESCRI: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Protection,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Stability loss by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Protection Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Protection Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_PROTECTION2_DESCRI: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Protection,1)] Buff that subsequently reduces Stability loss by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Protection Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Protection Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_REVERSAL_FATE_DESC: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Fate Reversal,1)] Buff for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Fate Reversal Paste Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds. While this Buff is active a $[STYLE(Fate,1)] Buff is added or its duration is extended for every $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Fate Reversal Buff,VAL,ABS)},1)] Defect Points added.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_STABILISATION1_DES: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 1 Stabilisation,1)] Buff that subsequently adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Buff 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] Stability for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Paste 1 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_PASTE_STABILISATION2_DES: A Centraforge Ingredient which applies a $[STYLE(Lvl 2 Stabilisation,1)] Buff that subsequently adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Buff 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] Stability for $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Stabilisation Paste 2 Status Effect Applied Duration,VAL,ABS)},1)] rounds.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_RESIN_DECONSTRUCTION1_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which aborts Forging and sacrifices the Gear. There is a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Deconstruction Resin 1 Recycling Chance,VAL,ABS)},1)] chance of recovering each Ingredient used in Forging this Gear. Unused Ingredients are returned untouched.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_RESIN_DECONSTRUCTION2_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which aborts Forging and sacrifices the Gear. There is a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Deconstruction Resin 2 Recycling Chance,VAL,ABS)},1)] chance of recovering each Ingredient used in Forging this Gear. Unused ingredients are returned untouched.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_RESIN_DECONSTRUCTION3_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which aborts Forging and sacrifices the Gear. There is a $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Deconstruction Resin 3 Recycling Chance,VAL,ABS)},1)] chance of recovering each Ingredient used in Forging this Gear. Unused Ingredients are returned untouched.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_RESIN_SETTING_DESCRIPTIO: A Centraforge Ingredient which finishes Forging the current Gear, permanently locking in the Traits applied. Setting takes some time, progress can be seen in the Centraforge's Queue.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_BOON1_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Boon applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Removal Solvent 1 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Boon Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_BOON2_DE: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Boon applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Boon Removal Solvent 2 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Boon Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_DEFECT1_: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Defect applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Removal Solvent 1 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Defect Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_DEFECT2_: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Defect applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Defect Removal Solvent 2 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Defect Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_QUIRK1_D: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Quirk applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Removal Solvent 1 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_REMOVAL_QUIRK2_D: A Centraforge Ingredient which removes the last Quirk applied and adds $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Forge Quirk Removal Solvent 2 Points Proportion After Removal,VAL,ABS)},1)] of its Quirk Points.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_TRANSMUTE_BOON_D: A Centraforge Ingredient which changes the type of the last Boon added.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_TRANSMUTE_DEFECT: A Centraforge Ingredient which changes the type of the last Defect added.
ITEM_TYPE_FORGE_SOLVENT_TRANSMUTE_QUIRK_: A Centraforge Ingredient which changes the type of the last Quirk added.
ITEM_TYPE_FOSSIL_LARGE_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A useful fossilised Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_FOSSIL_MEDIUM_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A useful fossilised Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_FOSSIL_SMALL_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: An interesting fossilised Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_AMANITA_DESCRIPTION: A dark spotted Fungus known for its useful Resources. Found only on the Known Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_AMANITA_DUGUP_DESCRIPTI: A dark spotted Fungus known for its useful Resources. Found only on the Known Worlds.

ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_BRACKET_DUGUP_DESCRIPTI: A rare boulder-like Fungus with tongue-like protrusions. A useful source of certain Lamella and Orbs.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_CORAL_DESCRIPTION: A rare Fungus which grows in tower-like clusters. Has a slightly radioactive appearance. A good source of certain Lamella and Orbs.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_CORAL_DUGUP_DESCRIPTION: A rare Fungus which grows in tower-like clusters. Has a slightly radioactive appearance. A good source of certain Lamella and Orbs.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_DRIPPING_DESCRIPTION: A gloomy looking Fungus that appears to weep. Drops useful Resources when Harvested.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_DRIPPING_DUGUP_DESCRIPT: A gloomy looking Fungus that appears to weep. Drops useful Resources when Harvested.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_GLOWING_DESCRIPTION: A strange glowing Fungus which contains useful Resources.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_GLOWING_DUGUP_DESCRIPTI: A strange glowing Fungus which contains useful Resources.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_SCATTER_DESCRIPTION: A red-capped Fungus that grows in scattered groups. Tends to have edible parts.
ITEM_TYPE_FUNGUS_SCATTER_DUGUP_DESCRIPTI: A red-capped Fungus that grows in scattered groups. Tends to have edible parts.
ITEM_TYPE_FURNITURE_PLINTH_BASE_DESCRIPT: A nice solid Plinth. Use decoratively or Craft into a Request Basket or Shop Stand.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_AMETHYST_COMPACT_DESCRIPTI: A compacted precious purple Block. A more advanced Recipe Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_AMETHYST_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: A beautifully decorated Amethyst cube. Adds interest to buildings.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_AMETHYST_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A Seam of purple Gems embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_DIAMOND_COMPACT_DESCRIPTIO: A compressed Block of solid Diamond, useful as an advanced Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_DIAMOND_DECORATIVE_DESCRIP: A nicely decorated construction Block. Give your Builds some bling.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_DIAMOND_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A useful source of Rough Diamond embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_EMERALD_COMPACT_DESCRIPTIO: A gleaming green Block which can be Refined or used in Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_EMERALD_DECORATIVE_DESCRIP: A green decorative building Block. More interesting than Brick.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_EMERALD_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A green Gem Seam running through Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_RUBY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A solid, red Gemstone Block. Can be Refined.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_RUBY_DECORATIVE_DESCRIPTIO: A lovely red decorated Block. Good for building.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_RUBY_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A bright red Seam of Gems embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_SAPPHIRE_COMPACT_DESCRIPTI: A Block of solid Sapphire. Refine or use as an Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_SAPPHIRE_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: A bright blue decorated Block to bring colour to your Builds.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_SAPPHIRE_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A blue Gem Seam running through Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_TOPAZ_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A solid Block of Topaz. Refine or use as an Ingredient
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_TOPAZ_DECORATIVE_DESCRIPTI: Nicely finished, great for adding a little colour to Builds.
ITEM_TYPE_GEM_TOPAZ_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A source of rare Topaz embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_GLASS_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A transparent Block that is useful for seeing through.
ITEM_TYPE_GRASS_BARBED_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An unusually barbed Grass growing on Soil. Produces Seeds.
ITEM_TYPE_GRASS_GNARLED_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A long, rugged Grass found growing on Soil. Produces Seeds.
ITEM_TYPE_GRASS_VERDANT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A lush Grass found growing on Soil. Produces Seeds.
ITEM_TYPE_GRAVEL_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: Coarse crushed Rock. Not useful for much.
ITEM_TYPE_GROWTH_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A Block covered in a strange, thick Growth. May hinder Movement Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_ICE_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Frozen water, often covered in snow. Very slippery underfoot.
ITEM_TYPE_ICE_GLACIER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A more compact Ice that may contain Resources.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_AMALGAM_BLAST_DESCRIPTION: A rare mixture with protective qualities.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_AMALGAM_CHILL_DESCRIPTION: A light-blue Amalgam with protective qualities.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_AMALGAM_CORROSION_DESCRIP: A rare purple Amalgam with Corrosion Shielding properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_AMALGAM_SHOCK_DESCRIPTION: A yellow-hued Amalgam with Shock Shielding properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_AMALGAM_TOXIN_DESCRIPTION: A rarely acquired Amalgam with Toxin Shielding properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_COMPONE: An artifact of an age long forgotten. A somewhat vital Component.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_DEVICE_: A rare and ancient artifact from a time long past. Some sort of Tech Device.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_FRAGMEN: An interesting artifact from an almost forgotten era. Did someone say Oortian?
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BAG_FLOUR_DESCRIPTION: Flour, a whole bag full. Could be useful for baking.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BAG_RICE_DESCRIPTION: A single grain of Rice can tip the scale but a Bag of Rice can make a whole bunch of nutritious Recipes!
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BAG_SUGAR_DESCRIPTION: A Bag of Sugar for the Citizen with a sweet-tooth.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BEACONFUEL_BASIC_DESCRIPT: A more powerful form of Beacon Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BEAN_BITTER_DESCRIPTION: A rare and unpleasant Bean that's far too bitter for consumption.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BEAN_SPICY_DESCRIPTION: A strange and particularly piquant Bean.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BEAN_SWEET_DESCRIPTION: A peculiar Bean. Nice and sweet.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BLOOD_VOLATILE_DESCRIPTIO: The Volatile Blood of a Volatile Creature. Somewhat Volatile.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BOMBCHARGE_BASE_DESCRIPTI: Only the most Volatile Ingredients will do when making this essential Bomb component.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BONDINGAGENT_BASE_DESCRIP: A special type of Glue for sticking certain things.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BONDINGAGENT_ENRICHED_DES: A rare Enriched Glue that sticks even better.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BONDINGAGENT_SUPERENRICHE: A Super-Enriched Bonding Agent for super strong adhesion.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BONE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Rattle them Creature Bones, or at least Craft with them.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_CONTAINER1_DESCRIPTI: A simple Goblet used when mixing Minor Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_CONTAINER2_DESCRIPTI: A stronger Iron-based Goblet used for mixing and holding Improved Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_CONTAINER3_DESCRIPTI: A sturdy dual-handled Goblet to swig Greater Brews from.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_CONTAINER4_DESCRIPTI: A tough yet beautifully decorated Goblet for mixing and consuming Super Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_CONTAINER5_DESCRIPTI: A robust and ornate Gemstone Goblet used to create and quaff Mega Brews.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_FOCUS_DESCRIPTION: Get in the zone with a Focus Brew. Works in tandem with Focus Skills allowing you to use the Damage you deal to Creatures to greater effect. Consume only when you have Focus Accumulated.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_RAGE_DESCRIPTION: Release the beast with a Rage Brew! Works in tandem with Rage Skills allowing you to use the Damage you receive from Creature Attacks to your advantage. Consume only when you have Rage Accumulated.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BUTTER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Mix Milk for long enough and you'll get Butter!
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BUTTER_FORTIFIED_DESCRIPT: A rich, dark Butter that's rich, dark and buttery.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BUTTER_PURIFIED_DESCRIPTI: A light, delicate Butter that's just a little purer.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_CHARCOAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A piece of exceedingly charred Wood.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_CLOTH_SACK_DESCRIPTION: A rough, hardy Cloth. Might be useful for carrying things.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A medium-density black Rock. Seems combustible.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_HARD_DESCRIPTION: A dense chunk of combustible black Rock. Could be used to Fuel things?
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_SOFT_DESCRIPTION: A small, combustible black Rock. Some sort of Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COG_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A useful component for gizmos and thingy-ma-bobs.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COIN_DESCRIPTION: Coin can be used for Trading.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EYE_HOPPER_DESCRIPTION: An Eye from a Hopper, somehow fully intact despite the creature's explosive nature.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EYE_ROADRUNNER_DESCRIPTIO: The Eye of a Roadrunner that wasn't quite speedy enough!
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EYE_SPITTER_DESCRIPTION: An eye-popping organ from a sharp-shooting Spitter.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EYE_WILDSTOCK_DESCRIPTION: I spy with my little Wildstock Eye a very useful Organ.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOSSIL_LARGE_DESCRIPTION: Prized by archaeologists and Known Worlds Crafters alike!
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOSSIL_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION: A slightly larger Fossil of a Creature long deceased.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FRAGMENT_COBALT_DESCRIPTI: A mineral Fragment that's blue as the sea.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FRAGMENT_OLIVINE_DESCRIPT: A rare yet versatile mineral Fragment.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FRAGMENT_SALTPETER_DESCRI: Somewhat explosive, under the right circumstances.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FRAGMENT_SULFUR_DESCRIPTI: Bright yellow and brilliantly useful for giving extra oomph.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FUSION_ELEMENTAL_DESCRIPT: All the Element Shards fused together. Has its uses.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLAND_ADRENAL_DESCRIPTION: The Adrenal Gland of the exceedingly speedy Roadrunner. Could be used to give things more momentum.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLAND_FLOATATIONSAC_DESCR: A remarkably buoyant Organ which is responsible for keeping Cuttletrunks airborne.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLAND_MILK_DESCRIPTION: Wildstock Milk Gland, because even the Known Worlds have Mammals.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLAND_SPARKSAC_DESCRIPTIO: A Spitter's Spark Sac which allows the Creature to fire it's natural projectile weaponry fast and far.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLAND_THERMALSAC_DESCRIPT: Thermal Sac, the organ that makes Hoppers explode.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_HIDE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: The pelt of a native Known Worlds Creature.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_INK_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Ink, what else would you write Signs with?
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LAMELLA_EDIBLE_DESCRIPTIO: An edible piece of Fungus, plain an simple.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LAMELLA_GLOWING_DESCRIPTI: The strangely luminous gills of a Mushroom-like growth.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LAMELLA_REACTIVE_DESCRIPT: The highly reactive gills of certain Fungus. Found only in the Known Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEAF_FIBROUS_DESCRIPTION: A thick, stringy Plant Leaf. Contains fibres.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEAF_FLESHY_DESCRIPTION: A plump, fleshy Leaf found most commonly amongst some Plants.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEAF_INKY_DESCRIPTION: An oily Leaf found among certain Plants. Contains Ink.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEATHER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A nice, strong Creature Hide turned into Leather.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MANTLE_CREATURE_DESCRIPTI: A robust, natural armour-plating found on some Creature species.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A nice, shiny Bar of Copper.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_GOLDALLOY_DESCRIPTI: Go for Gold with this precious Metal Alloy.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A super-heated metal Bar with a heart of Gold.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A toughish Iron Bar used for making things with Iron in.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_SILVERALLOY_DESCRIP: High ho Silver Alloy, all in a Metal mix.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A Bar of Silver, not the most precious of metals but still extremely useful.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_TITANIUMALLOY_DESCR: Make Titanium Alloy your ally. High-grade and extremely useful.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTIO: Use your cranium, get Titanium. A tough high-grade Metal Bar.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKIGNEOUS_DESC: A mixture containing Igneous Stones. Could be useful for Building if hardened.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKMETAMORPHIC_: A mixture with Metamorphic Stones. Maybe it can be turned into Bricks somehow.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKSEDIMENTARY_: A hard to come by Sedimentary Stone mix which looks like it might make good Bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_NAIL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: When Glue won't do, use Nails.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_OIL_RESTORATIVE_DESCRIPTI: A bright yellow Oil with Restorative properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORB_PULSATING_DESCRIPTION: A Pulsating Orb with a very Oortian look.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORB_SHADOW_DESCRIPTION: A mysterious Orb with an air of darkness.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORB_SHIMMERING_DESCRIPTIO: A bright, glistening Orb. Organic and rare.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORB_VITAL_DESCRIPTION: An ornate organic Orb with an intricate design.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A simple piece of Rock speckled with Copper, found here and there.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: All that glisters isn't Gold, but it may contain it; like this jagged Rock.

ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A piece of Rock with a Silver lining - much like a cloud, but heavier.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTION: A Titanium flecked Rock. May prove to be a strong and useful Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_PETAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A pleasantly scented Ingredient found among certain flora.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_REFINED_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTI: Diamonds are not quite forever if you Craft them into something else.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_REFINED_EMERALD_DESCRIPTI: As green as grass, but much stronger.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_REFINED_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A perfectly polished vision in scarlet.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_REFINED_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A nicely Refined glassy yellow-orange jewel.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROCKDROP_FLINT_DESCRIPTIO: A decidedly primal material found throughout the Universe.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROCKDROP_OPAL_DESCRIPTION: An iridescent gemstone found amongst Rocks.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTIO: A rough, unpolished Rock packed with a not so hidden gem, Amethyst.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_BLINK_DESCRIPTION: Ultra rare, Blink and you might miss it.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_DARKMATTER_DESCRIPT: A hefty piece of Rock studded with a Gemstone found only around the Known Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTION: Diamonds in the rough, quite literally.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_EMERALD_DESCRIPTION: A jagged Rock dotted with green gems.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_OORTSTONE_DESCRIPTI: An wedge of Rock peppered with an Ultra-Rare gemstone from the Oortian era.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A simple lump of Rock dotted with a beautiful iridescent Gemstone.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: Red sky at night, Shepherds delight; red lumps in a Rock, it's definitely Rough Ruby.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTIO: Once in a blue moon, you'll find a rough Rock peppered with Sapphire. Or maybe a little more often.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A rare, uneven Rock containing lumps of yellow Topaz.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SAP_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A nutritious, sticky liquid found in Trees.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_BARBEDGRASS_DESCRIPT: A type of Seed which sprouts an unpleasantly spiky Grass when planted.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_GNARLEDGRASS_DESCRIP: A simple Seed which sprouts a thick, knotted Grass when planted.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_VERDANTGRASS_DESCRIP: A Seed which sprouts a tall, flourishing Grass when planted.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_BLAST_DESCRIPTION: A rare relation to precious Diamond found on Blast-type Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_BURN_DESCRIPTION: A rare red Gemstone Shard most likely obtained on Burn-type Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_CHILL_DESCRIPTION: A rare, bright blue Shard most commonly obtained on Chill-type Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_CORROSION_DESCRIPTI: A crystalline form of Amethyst more common on Corrosive-type Worlds.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_OORT_DESCRIPTION: A crystalline manifestation of Oort energy.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_SHOCK_DESCRIPTION: An unusual Shard related to the rare Gemstone Topaz.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_TOXIN_DESCRIPTION: A bright Green crystalline Shard found on Toxic-type Worlds. Rare and useful.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_STICK_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A humble Stick. Small, unassuming yet surprisingly useful.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TALLOW_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A good hunk of rendered Creature fat.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TROPHY_CUTTLETRUNK_DESCRI: A very rarely acquired Tentacle from the menacing Squid of the sky, Cuttletrunk. Sought after by Known Worlders.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TROPHY_HOPPER_DESCRIPTION: Thermal Core Trophy, a hot little number collected from a Hopper.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TROPHY_ROADRUNNER_DESCRIP: Feel as proud as a peacock, or Roadrunner at least with this much sought after Feather.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TROPHY_SPITTER_DESCRIPTIO: A rare armoured Scale from a Spitter. Highly prized among Known Worlders.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TROPHY_WILDSTOCK_DESCRIPT: A rarely obtained Wildstock Horn, prized amongst Known World Citizens.
ITEM_TYPE_LANTERN_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTI: A decorative Lantern which emits light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTI: An Torch which burns with a strong purple glow. Crafted using Amethyst Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A simple Wooden Torch with a soft, gentle glow.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTIO: A simple Torch that emits a bright, white light. Crafted using Diamond Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_EMERALD_DESCRIPTIO: A green, glowing Torch powered by an Emerald Gem.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_IMPROVED_DESCRIPTI: A Wooden Torch with a little extra glow.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A red-hued Torch powered by rare Ruby Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A bright blue glowing Torch. Made using rare Sapphire Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Torch that burns with a yellow-orange glow. Gets its hue from rare Topaz Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_LOCATION_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: An unusual Token which contains coordinates for a particular Location. Can be sold or given to other Citizens.
ITEM_TYPE_LOCK_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Keeps your stuff locked up! Prevents Citizens without Permissions from accessing your Doors, Machines and Storage.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_COMPACTOR_BASE_DESCRIP: The Compactor. Condenses materials to create stronger, more advanced Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRAFTINGTABLE_BASE_DES: A Wooden Crafting Table for crafting basic Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_IRON_DESCRIPT: The top of a moderately efficient Furnace. Place on an Iron Furnace Base to create a useable Furnace. Cooks and Smelts a little faster than its Stone counterpart. Requires a moderate amount of Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_STONE_DESCRIP: The top half of a simple Furnace. Place on a Stone Furnace Base to create a working Furnace for cooking or smelting. Stone Furnaces can be slow and Fuel hungry.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_TITANIUM_DESC: The top of a highly efficient Furnace. Place on top of a Titanium Furnace Base for a useable Furnace. Cooks and Smelts almost anything. Fast and Fuel efficient.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_COMPACTORADVANC: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to a Compactor. Place with around a 1m air gap between the Coil and Compactor. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_COMPACTOR_DESCR: A Power source which adds $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to a Compactor. It must be placed with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and Compactor. When placed correctly a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_EXTRACTORADVANC: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to an Extractor. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and Extractor. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_EXTRACTOR_DESCR: A Power source which adds $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to an Extractor. It must be placed with an air gap of roughly 1m between the Coil and Extractor. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_FORGEADVANCED_D: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to a Centraforge. It must be placed so that there is around a 1m air gap between the Coil and the Centraforge. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_FORGE_DESCRIPTI: A Power source specifically designed to add $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to a Centraforge. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and the Centraforge; when placed correctly a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_MIXERADVANCED_D: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to a Mixer. Place with around a 1m air gap between the Coil and the Mixer. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_MIXER_DESCRIPTI: A Power source which adds $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to a Mixer. It must be placed with around a 1m air gap between the Coil and Mixer. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_REFINERYADVANCE: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to a Refinery. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and Refinery. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_REFINERY_DESCRI: A Power source which adds $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to a Refinery. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and Refinery. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_WORKBENCHADVANC: An advanced Power source which adds $[STYLE(300 Power,1)] to a Workbench. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and the Workbench. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_WORKBENCH_DESCR: A Power source which adds $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to a Workbench. It must be placed so that there is an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and Workbench. When correctly placed a Power Beam will connect the two.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_EXTRACTOR_BASE_DESCRIP: The Extractor, used for Extracting stuff! Great when you need raw materials.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FIREPIT_IRON_DESCRIPTI: The base of a more efficient Furnace. Place an Iron Furnace Crucible on top to create a working Furnace for cooking or smelting faster. Works faster and uses less Fuel than its Stone counterpart.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FIREPIT_STONE_DESCRIPT: The base of a simple Furnace. Place a Stone Furnace Crucible on top to create a working Furnace for cooking or smelting. Stone Furnaces can be slow and Fuel hungry.

ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FORGE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: The Centraforge can be used to add a little something extra to Gear.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_MIXER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A Machine that mixes, homogeneously combining Ingredients together to form new materials.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_PIPE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A Link cable that carries Spark from a Spark Generator to a Machine.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_POWERCORE_BASE_DESCRIP: A Fuel Cell for generating Spark. Requires raw Fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_REFINERY_BASE_DESCRIPT: The Refinery helps to make Items more refined! Makes Blocks more valuable and bags more full!
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_WORKBENCH_BASE_DESCRIP: A bigger, more advanced relative of the Crafting Table. Some assembly is required.

ITEM_TYPE_METAL_COPPER_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A source of Copper. Found embedded in Rock.

ITEM_TYPE_METAL_GOLD_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A useful source of Gold; embedded in Rock.

ITEM_TYPE_METAL_SILVER_REFINED_DESCRIPTI: A purified Silver Alloy. Used in more advanced Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_SILVER_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A source of Silver. Found embedded in Rock.

ITEM_TYPE_METAL_TITANIUM_SEAM_DESCRIPTIO: A source of Titanium embedded in Rock.

ITEM_TYPE_PLAIN_WOOD_POLE_DESCRIPTION: A simple decorative Pole crafted from Wood.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_SEDIMENTARY_STONES_DESCRI: Sedimentary Rock crafted into useful Stones.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_STALAGMITE_DESCRIPTION: A tapered bit of Boulder. Quite nice to look at.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_TALL_DUGUP_DESCRIPTION: Taller than a basic Boulder and a little more interesting. A nice-ish decoration.

ITEM_TYPE_SIGN_GLEAM_MODULAR_DESCRIPTION: A surface for writing on. Place Sign Modules together to write larger or longer messages.

ITEM_TYPE_SIGN_WOOD_MODULAR_DESCRIPTION: A surface for writing on. Place Sign Modules together to write larger or longer messages.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_CLAY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An easy to find dense and solid Soil. Useful in a different form.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_CLAY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A dense and solid Soil compressed to form a useful building material.

ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_SILTY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A compressed block of powdery Soil. Nice and solid, could be a useful Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_BLINK_COMPACT_DESCRIPT: A compressed shimmering cube of Blink. Can be further Refined.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_BLINK_DECORATIVE_DESCR: A mosaic design decorative cube crafted using Refined Blink. An elegant building material.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_BLINK_REFINED_DESCRIPT: A cube of refined Blink, similar to polished marble. Used to for Advanced Crafting.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_BLINK_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: An ultra rare Resource embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_DARKMATTER_COMPACT_DES: An iridescent cube of compacted Darkmatter. Can be Refined for use in Advanced Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_DARKMATTER_DECORATIVE_: Ultra Rare purified Darkmatter crafted into an intriguing patterned Block.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_DARKMATTER_REFINED_DES: A polished block of pure Darkmatter. An advanced Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_DARKMATTER_SEAM_DESCRI: A Seam of ultra rare Darkmatter embedded in Rock. Break to release Rough Darkmatter.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_OORTSTONE_COMPACT_DESC: A compacted cube of Oortstone. Refine it for use in more Advanced Crafting Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_OORTSTONE_DECORATIVE_D: An intricately patterned block of pure Oortstone. Can be used for building.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_OORTSTONE_REFINED_DESC: A purified cube of shimmering Oortstone. Used in Advanced Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_OORTSTONE_SEAM_DESCRIP: A Seam of ultra rare Oortstone running through Rock. Break to release Rough Oortstone.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_RIFT_COMPACT_DESCRIPTI: A blue-hued iridescent cube of ultra rare Rift. Can be Refined for use in Advanced Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_RIFT_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: A decorative Block of iridescent Rift etched with an interesting pattern.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_RIFT_REFINED_DESCRIPTI: A shimmering cube of purified Rift. A rare and unusual Block which can be Refined.
ITEM_TYPE_SPECIAL_RIFT_SEAM_DESCRIPTION: A source of ultra rare Rift embedded in Rock.
ITEM_TYPE_SPONGE_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A soft springy Block, which can increase Jump Height.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_GLEAM_BEAM_DESCRIPTION: A nice, decorative Beam. Gives Builds a little flair.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_GLEAM_POLE_DESCRIPTION: A gently glowing decorative Pole for adding interest to builds.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_METAL_BEAM_DESCRIPTION: A horizontal Metal Beam with style.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_METAL_POLE_DESCRIPTION: A Metal Pole with a little decorative flair.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_STONE_BEAM_DESCRIPTION: A horizontal Stone Beam for adding style to Builds.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_STONE_POLE_DESCRIPTION: A Stone Pole with a bit of style. Ornamental.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_WOOD_BEAM_DESCRIPTION: A nicely patterned horizontal Beam for decorative purposes.
ITEM_TYPE_STYLISH_WOOD_POLE_DESCRIPTION: A decorative Wooden Pole with a little more style.
ITEM_TYPE_TANGLE_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A thick knotted Block, which can hinder Movement Speed.
ITEM_TYPE_THORNS_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: A sharp and prickly Block, which may cause Damage.

ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_IRON_DESCRIPTION: An Iron Axe for cutting down Trees. More durable than a Wood Tool.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_OORT_STONE_DESCRIPTIO: A strong Oortstone Axe that takes out trees in a jiffy.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A tough Rift Axe that does a considerable amount of Damage to Wood and Trees.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: An Axe made from Ruby. It is most effective against Tree-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTION: A good Damage-dealing Axe that breaks Wood and Tree-type Blocks best.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: An Axe made from Silver Alloy. Swings swiftly for effective Tree chopping.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A sturdy Stone Axe. Chops Trees faster, lasts a little longer.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTION: An Axe made from Titanium Alloy. A strong choice for chopping Wood-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Topaz Axe for chopping Wood and Trees quickly ... if you have the Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A crude Wooden Axe. Slow but effective while Durability lasts.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_AMETHYST_DESCR: A bag of powerful Amethyst Bombs. Works well against stronger Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_BLINK_DESCRIPT: Throwable Blink Bombs in a Bag. Ultra Rare but extremely effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_COPPER_DESCRIP: A bag of throwable Bombs made from Copper. Causes Damage to nearby Creatures on detonation.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_DARK_MATTER_DE: A Bag of extremely rare Darkmatter Bombs. Throw near Creatures to deal a good amount of Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_DIAMOND_DESCRI: Diamond Bombs for throwing. Stored in a handy bag. Effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_EMERALD_DESCRI: A bag of tough Emerald Throwing Bombs. Does a good amount of Damage to nearby Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_GOLD_DESCRIPTI: A Bag of Gold Alloy Bombs for lobbing. Causes Damage to Creatures close to the detonation site.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_IRON_DESCRIPTI: A bag of Iron Bombs for flinging. Causes Damage to nearby Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_OORT_STONE_DES: A bag of super-rare Oortstone Bombs. Deals lots of Damage when thrown near Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_RIFT_DESCRIPTI: An ultra-rare Bag of Bombs for effective Creature control.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_RUBY_DESCRIPTI: A bag of bright Red Bombs. A powerful projectile Weapon for dealing with Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_SAPPHIRE_DESCR: Bright blue Sapphire Bombs in a bag. Deals with Creatures fast.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_SILVER_DESCRIP: A bag of throwable Silver Alloy Bombs. Causes Damage to Creatures when detonated nearby.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_TITANIUM_DESCR: A bag of Titanium Alloy Bombs for throwing. Causes Damage to nearby Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BAGOFBOMBS_TOPAZ_DESCRIPT: Tough Topaz Bombs for lobbing at Creatures. Does a good amount of Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BEACON_PLOT_ADD_DESCRIPTI: A useful Tool for extending Beacons. Allows you to add more Land Plots.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BEACON_PLOT_REMOVE_DESCRI: A handy Tool for removing Land Plots you no longer want from a Beacon.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTI: A Chisel made from Amethyst. It can be used to shape Blocks into right-angled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_BLINK_DESCRIPTION: A Blink Chisel for shaping Blocks. Good for tougher materials.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A Copper Chisel specially designed for carving sloped shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_DARK_MATTER_DESCRI: A Chisel made from Darkmatter. It can be used to shape Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTIO: A Chisel made from Diamond. It can be used to shape Blocks into detailed bevelled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_EMERALD_DESCRIPTIO: A Chisel made from Emerald. It can be used to shape Blocks into bevelled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A Gold Alloy Chisel for shaping Blocks into detailed bevelled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A Chisel made from Iron. It can be used to carve Blocks into bevelled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_OORT_STONE_DESCRIP: A Chisel made from Oortstone. It can be used to shape Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A Chisel made from Rift. Good for shaping tougher Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A Chisel made from Ruby. It can be used to shape Blocks into sloped shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A Chisel made from Sapphire. It can be used to shape Blocks into detailed right-angled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A Silver Chisel for carving more detailed sloped shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A Chisel for carving Blocks into right-angled shapes. Ineffective against some rarer materials.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTI: A Titanium Alloy Chisel for shaping Blocks into detailed right-angled shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_CHISEL_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Chisel made from Topaz. It can be used to shape Blocks into detailed sloped shapes.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_AMETHYST_DESCRIPT: A Grappling Tool made from Amethyst. Grab. Grapple. Traverse.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_BLINK_DESCRIPTION: A Grappling Tool made from Blink. Used for grabbing and Traversing.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_COPPER_DESCRIPTIO: A Grappling Tool that's basic but gets the job done. Use it to traverse the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_DARK_MATTER_DESCR: A Darkmatter Tool used for Grappling. Traverse or grab from a distance.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTI: A Diamond Grappling Tool. Good for grabbing or traversing the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_EMERALD_DESCRIPTI: A Grappling Tool made from Emerald. It can be used for traversing the World or grabbing things.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A strong Grappling Tool made from Gold Alloy. Great for grabbing or traversing.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A slightly stronger Iron Grappling Tool for traversing across the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_OORT_STONE_DESCRI: A Grappling Tool made from Oortstone for grabbing or Traversing.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A Grappling Tool made from Rift. Great for grabbing or traversing.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A Grappling Tool made from Ruby. Grab with it, Grapple with it, traverse with it.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPT: A Grappling Tool made from Sapphire. Use it to traverse across the World or grab things out of reach.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_SILVER_DESCRIPTIO: An effective Silver Grappling Tool which can be deployed quickly. Useful for traversing the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_TITANIUM_DESCRIPT: A tough Grappling Tool made from Titanium Alloy. Use it for grabbing or traversing the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_GRAPPLE_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Grappling Tool made from Topaz. It can be used to traverse across the World.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTI: A sturdy Amethyst Hammer for breaking Rocks and Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_BLINK_DESCRIPTION: A Blink Hammer made for fast and effective Rock smashing. Smashes Energy almost as fast.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A strong Copper Hammer for breaking Rocks. Has more Durability.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_DARK_MATTER_DESCRI: A very rare Darkmatter Hammer. Takes Energy to use, smashes through Rock-type Blocks easily.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTIO: A Diamond Hammer that makes breaking tough Rocks a little easier.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_EMERALD_DESCRIPTIO: A great green Hammer which breaks most Rocks with ease.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A heavy Gold Hammer which requires a reasonable amount of Energy to wield. Very effective against Rock-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A tough Iron Hammer for breaking Rocks. Reasonably Durable.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_OORT_STONE_DESCRIP: A very Oortian Hammer. Breaks Rocks and Gems easily but uses a lot of Energy to wield.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A hard-hitting Rift Hammer. Makes light work of Rocks and Gems but saps Energy quickly.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A robust red Hammer for smashing through Rocks. Requires a lot of Energy to use repeatedly.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A big, blue Block buster. Energy-hungry. Most effective against Rocks and Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A Silver Alloy Hammer with good Durability. Great for smashing Rock-type Blocks quickly.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A more durable Hammer made from Stone. Breaks Rocks a little quicker.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTI: A Titanium Alloy Hammer. Strong, durable and effective against Rock-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Topaz Hammer that swings quickly. Use for breaking Rocks and Gems.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A no-frills Wooden Tool for breaking Rock. Gets the job done eventually.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_LIGHT_CUBE_DESCRIPTION: An unassuming cube of Oort design. Shake it to light your way at night or when adventuring in the depths of dark caves.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_MAP_GLOBE_DESCRIPTION: A planet-shaped Tool of Oort design. Used for Navigation and Resource Scanning. Undiscovered Regions on the Atlas are covered in fog.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTI: A durable Amethyst Shovel that makes light work of Ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_BLINK_DESCRIPTION: A sturdy Shovel made from Blink. Digs quickly, takes a lot of Energy to use.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: An effective Copper Shovel. Best used for digging.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_DARK_MATTER_DESCRI: A Shovel with an unusual shimmer. Makes digging easy if you have lots of Energy.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTIO: A hefty Diamond Shovel for durable digging.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_EMERALD_DESCRIPTIO: A strong Shovel made from Emerald. Perfect for digging Ground-type Blocks quickly.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A shiny Gold Shovel. Heavy and effective.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_IRON_DESCRIPTION: An Iron Shovel to help you dig. Does a little more than a Wood Tool can before breaking.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_OORT_STONE_DESCRIP: A Shovel made from a rare precious Known World Gem. Very effective digger that consumes Energy fast.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: A super-strong Rift Shovel. Heavy and effective. Very Energy-hungry.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: Dig deep and fast with a Ruby Shovel. Make sure you have plenty of Energy available.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A strong Sapphire Shovel for effective digging
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A Silver Alloy Shovel for swift digging. Makes lighter work of Ground-type Blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A Stone Tool for more effective digging. Lasts a little longer.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTI: A Titanium Alloy Shovel with great digging power.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A Wooden Shovel, plain and simple. Used for digging. Not particularly durable.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_AMETHYST_DESCRIP: A fast-firing ranged Weapon made from Amethyst. Great for warding off stronger Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_BLINK_DESCRIPTIO: An ultra-rare, fast-firing Weapon made from Blink. A good Creature Damager.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_COPPER_DESCRIPTI: A faster-firing ranged Weapon made from Copper. Best used against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_DARK_MATTER_DESC: A super-strong ranged Weapon made from rare Darkmatter. Does a lot of Damage to Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_DIAMOND_DESCRIPT: A ranged Weapon made from Diamond. Good for dealing Damage to Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_EMERALD_DESCRIPT: Strong, green and full of fire power. Makes lighter work of Creature Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A ranged Weapon made from Gold Alloy. Does a reasonable amount of Damage to Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A solid and steady ranged Weapon made with Iron. Effective against Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_OORT_STONE_DESCR: The most Oort of all the Slingbows. Crafted using Oortstone; excellent for dealing with Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_RIFT_DESCRIPTION: An ultra-rare ranged Weapon made from Rift. Takes Energy to wield but deals a lot of Damage.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A powerful ranged Weapon made from Ruby. Slower than some, but does more Damage with each hit.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIP: A strong Sapphire Slingbow for dealing with Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_SILVER_DESCRIPTI: A ranged Weapon that fires a little faster. Deals Damage to Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_STONE_DESCRIPTIO: A Weapon made for firing. Helps to fend off Creatures.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_TITANIUM_DESCRIP: A ranged Titanium Alloy Weapon. Not the fastest to fire but does more Damage with each hit.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SLINGBOW_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTIO: A fast-firing Weapon made from Topaz. Deals with Creatures well.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_AMETHYST_DESCRIPT: An Amethyst Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. Particularly useful when mending Centraforges and their Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_COPPER_DESCRIPTIO: A shiny Copper Spanner for repairing certain Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTI: A Diamond Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. Most effective at mending Workbenches and their Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_EMERALD_DESCRIPTI: An Emerald Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. Mends Mixers and their Power Coils most effectively.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A strong Gold Spanner for repairing certain Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A strong Iron Spanner for repairing damage to some types of Machine.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A sturdy red Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. Best used on Compactors and their Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPT: A Sapphire Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. More effective at repairing Extractor Machines and their Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_SILVER_DESCRIPTIO: A Silver Spanner for repairing damaged Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A useful Tool for repairing certain types of Crafting Machine.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_TITANIUM_DESCRIPT: A Titanium Alloy Spanner for repairing damaged Crafting Machines.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SPANNER_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A Topaz Spanner for repairing Damaged Machines. Works most effectively on Refinery Machines and their Power Coils.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_TOTEM_DESCRIPTION: A seemingly basic Oort Tool with strange markings. Use it to gather Resources or add Augments for powerful results.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_TOTEM_FOUNDERS_DESCRIPTIO: A stronger, more advanced Oort Tool which can only be crafted by Citizens who have been around for a long time.
ITEM_TYPE_TOTEM_AMMO_DESCRIPTION: Turns a simple Totem into a powerful destination Tool. Combine with a Totem to enable Landing Site selection on new Worlds. Warp Augment are destroyed after each use.
ITEM_TYPE_TOTEM_AMMO_RESURRECTION_DESCRI: Turns a simple Totem into a Tool for Reviving Defeated Citizens. Combine with a Totem to temporarily gain the ability to Revive others. The Augment is consumed after each use.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_ORNATE_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A softly glowing Trapdoor with a beautiful Known World style. Makes floors a little more attractive.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_ORNATE_METAL_DESCRIPTION: An ornately decorated Metal Trapdoor whose purpose is looking nice, unless you stick a Lock on it!
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_ORNATE_STONE_DESCRIPTION: An ornately decorated Stone Trapdoor with a very Oortian feel. Can be secured using Locks.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_ORNATE_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A beautifully decorative Trapdoor made from Wood.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_PLAIN_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decoratively simple Trapdoor crafted using Gleam. Emits a constant soft glow.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_PLAIN_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A plain metal Trapdoor for the minimalist decorator. Can be secured with a Lock.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_PLAIN_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A simple Stone Trapdoor. Add a Lock to prevent unwanted access.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_PLAIN_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A simple Wooden Trapdoor for opening and closing. Place a Lock next to it to prevent unwanted guests!
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_STYLISH_GLEAM_DESCRIPTION: A decorative Trapdoor that glows night or day. Remember to add a Lock if you want make a Door secure!
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_STYLISH_METAL_DESCRIPTION: A Metal Trapdoor with a little decorative flair.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_STYLISH_STONE_DESCRIPTION: A Stylish Stone Trapdoor Piece. Place 2 or more pieces together to reveal a pattern. Ornamental.
ITEM_TYPE_TRAP_STYLISH_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A Wooden Trapdoor with a little more style. Can be both decorative and practical.
ITEM_TYPE_WARP_CONDUIT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: An intricately patterned Block which can be stacked with others to create a Warp.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: An intriguing patterned Block for building with.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_REFINED_DESCRIPTI: A simply patterned Block used for building.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TIMBER_DESCRIPTIO: Cut Ancient Wood. Widely used in Crafting.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TRUNK_DESCRIPTION: A slow-growing Wood with hard Bark. A much used Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_EXOTIC_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A frond-like Foliage sometimes used as an Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSH_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A plentiful Foliage found in some Trees. Sometimes used in Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_DECORATIVE_DESCR: A decorated building Block. Makes a nice pattern when placed beside Blocks of the same type.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_REFINED_DESCRIPT: A patterned Block of Wood for building with.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TIMBER_DESCRIPTI: Cut Lustrous Wood. Commonly used in Crafting Recipes.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TRUNK_DESCRIPTIO: A young irregular Wood. A common Recipe Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_DECORATIVE_DESCRI: A nicely decorated Wood construction Block.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TIMBER_DESCRIPTIO: Cut Twisted Wood. A much used Ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TRUNK_DESCRIPTION: A sinewy Wood. Used widely in Crafting.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_WAXY_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: A thick, Waxy Foliage found in Trees. Occasionally used in Recipes.
